T02D2534:128b-40: rgyu zhig pa las kyang 'bras bu 'byung bar mi rigs la /
T02D2534:128b-41: ma zhig pa las kyang mi rigs te /
T02D2534:129a-1: po skye ba rnams ni rmi lam dang 'dra bar 'dod do //
T02D2534:129a-2: ma zhig pa las 'bras bu skye na ni de'i cho 'bras bu ci yang med do //
T02D2534:129a-3: yang na zhig pas 'bras bu skye na ni de'i cho 'bras bu gang zhig las 'byung /
T02D2534:129a-4: de bas na dngos po skyes pa rnams la ji
T02D2534:129a-5: lta ji ltar rnam par brtags pa de lta de
T02D2534:129a-6: ltar rigs pa brtags bzod do //

T02D2534:129a-14: du 'dzin pa'i dngos po med pas 'dis 'di shes
T02D2534:129a-15: so zhes gzhag pa mi rigs so //
T02D2534:129a-16: rnam pa'i don ni med pa las yang rmi lam

T02D2534:129a-20: rnam par shes pa med par mtshungs pa nyid pas mi rigs so //
T02D2534:129a-22: rnam pa med pa yang mi rigs te /

T02D2534:129a-24: de ltar na shes pas mngon sum dang rjes su

T02D2534:131a-6: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su dznya'n k'a ya /

T02D2534:135a-9: bya'o // khro bo chen po ni nyi ma la sogs pa gza' gdug pa rnams dang /
T02D2534:135a-11: sems can rnams la 'khu ba'i bsam pas gnas pa'i phyir khor bo chen pa'o //
T02D2534:135a-12: khro bas khro ba thams cad drungs nas 'byin bas
T02D2534:135a-13: nam chod pa chen po khro bo che ste rdo
T02D2534:135a-14: rje blo'o // khro ba thams cad dgrar gyur pas
T02D2534:135a-15: khro bo chen po khro ba che ba ni don
T02D2534:135a-17: sku mdog ljang gu zhal bzhi pa phyag brgyad pa /
T02D2534:135a-18: zhal dang po mche ba gtsigs pa mdog ljang gu /
T02D2534:135a-22: phyag g-yas pa rnams na ral gri dang /
T02D2534:135a-26: g-yon gyis gdug pa rnams la sdigs mdzub mdzad pa /
T02D2534:135a-30: g-yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas bzhugs pa /
T02D2534:135a-31: ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas khro bo 'bar
T02D2534:135a-32: bas sems can thams cad kyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i
T02D2534:135a-33: nyon mongs pa khro ba bag chags dang bcas pa
T02D2534:135a-34: thams cad bsregs nas nyon mongs pa rnam par bsal
T02D2534:135a-35: ba de rnams sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la rab
T02D2534:135a-41: bdag gir shin tu chags pa dang /
T02D2534:135a-42: nga dang yang ye zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2534:135a-43: bdag dang bdag gir mngon par zhen pa bsal bas na /
T02D2534:135a-44: chags pa thams cad sel bar byed //
T02D2534:135a-47: mchod pa chen po chags pa che //
T02D2534:135a-49: 'dir yang mchod pa chen po chags pa che ba ni bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan te /
T02D2534:135a-50: gser gyi mdog can zhal bzhi pa phyag brgyad pa /
T02D2534:135a-51: zhal gyi rnams par dbye bas na /
T02D2534:135a-56: phyag g-yas dang g-yon rnams na rdo rje dang /
T02D2534:135b-1: yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang /
T02D2534:135b-5: rgyal po'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02D2534:135b-6: ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las rin chen 'byung
T02D2534:135b-7: ldan gyi sprin byung bas sems can thams cad ji
T02D2534:135b-8: ltar mngon par 'dod pa bzhin du bsam pa thams
T02D2534:135b-9: cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad cing rin po che
T02D2534:135b-10: la sogs pa'i char phab par chags pa'i rdul zhi
T02D2534:135b-11: bar mdzad cing sems can rnams kyi smes chags pa
T02D2534:135b-13: chags pa dang bral bar byas pa rnams sangs rgyas nyid la sbyar bar bsam par bya'o //
T02D2534:135b-14: ci'i de ltar sbyor ba byas she na ;
T02D2534:135b-16: sangs rgyas thams cad chags las 'khrungs //
T02D2534:135b-17: de bzhin rmongs dang sdang las 'khrung //
T02D2534:135b-18: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2534:135b-19: de yang 'di ltar bshad par rigs pa nyid du bstan par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2534:135b-24: chags pa rnams ni 'khor ba'i rgyu mtshang ba med
T02D2534:135b-25: pa yin zhing rnam par rtog pa'i ngo bo nyid
T02D2534:135b-26: yin na / ji ltar 'tshang rgya ba nyid khyi rgyur 'gyur /
T02D2534:135b-27: gal te thabs dang bcas pa las 'gyur ro zhe na /
T02D2534:135b-28: thabs kyis yongs su zin pa na /
T02D2534:135b-29: snga ma'i rang bzhin las 'phos sam 'on te ma yin /
T02D2534:135b-30: gal te rang bzhin snga ma las 'phos na de
T02D2534:135b-31: lta ni de lta na ni de khyad par can
T02D2534:135b-32: nyid kyis rdzas gzhan skyes nas sangs rgyas nyid thob
T02D2534:135b-33: par byed ni nged kyang 'dod pa nyid yin no
T02D2534:135b-34: // 'on te phyogs gnyis par ltar na ni rgyu
T02D2534:135b-35: mtshang ba med pa las phyin ci log gi 'bras
T02D2534:135b-36: bu 'byung ba ni 'gal ba nyid do //
T02D2534:135b-37: yang na dug gi nas pa med par byas pa
T02D2534:135b-38: bzhin du 'khor ba'i rgyur gyur pa'i nud pa nyid
T02D2534:135b-39: bsal nas 'dod chags la sogs pa yang rang gi
T02D2534:135b-40: ngo bo nyid kyis ston no zhe na /
T02D2534:135b-41: rang gi ngo bo nyid las tha dad pa'i nus
T02D2534:135b-42: pas ni bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi bstan pa
T02D2534:135b-43: la med de / nus pa dang bral ba nyid
T02D2534:135b-44: rang gi ngo bo dang bral ba yin pas rdzas
T02D2534:135b-45: gzhan pa 'byung ba'i phyogs nyid yin la ;
T02D2534:135b-46: rang bzhin mi 'gyur ba'i dngos po ni 'ga' yang med de /
T02D2534:135b-47: thams cad kyang skad cig ma nyid du bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2534:135b-48: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i ngo bo nyid 'dod chags dang /
T02D2534:136a-0: chags pa rnams ni chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnams par dag pa'i rang @136a * //
T02D2534:136a-1: bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid du rtogs na 'tshang rgya
T02D2534:136a-2: ba nyid kyi rgyur bas de bzhen gshegs pa la
T02D2534:136a-3: sogs pa'i nga rgyal gyis 'dod chags la sogs pa
T02D2534:136a-4: la brten pa ni sngags kyi tshul las 'gal ba
T02D2534:136a-5: med padm'a / ngo bo nyid med cing sgyu ma
T02D2534:136a-6: lta bur lhag par mos pas ni thams cad legs
T02D2534:136a-8: 'dod pa chen po bde ba che //
T02D2534:136a-9: dga' ba chen po mgu ba che //
T02D2534:136a-10: zhes bya ba ni yid kyi chos nyid khyad par bstan pa ste /
T02D2534:136a-11: sems can ma lus pa sangs rgyas nyid la rab
T02D2534:136a-12: tu 'god par 'dod par bzhed pa gang la yod
T02D2534:136a-13: pa'am / chen po rnams kyi de 'dod par bya ba yin pas 'dod pa chen po ste /
T02D2534:136a-14: de ni bcom ldan 'das ngag gi dbang phyug go//
T02D2534:136a-15: thar pa'i bde bskyed par byed par 'gyur bas na
T02D2534:136a-17: gong nas gong du rab tu dga' ba'i rgyur gyur pas dga' ba chen po'o //
T02D2534:136a-18: yang na bde ba chen po ni dkyil 'khor chen
T02D2534:136a-19: po'i tshul gyis lha mo thams cad la rol bar
T02D2534:136a-20: mdzad pas de rnams kyi 'dod par bya ba yin
T02D2534:136a-21: pas de ni 'dod pa chen po ste /
T02D2534:136a-22: de nyid kyis 'di ltar bde ba chen po 'byung
T02D2534:136a-23: ba'i gnas skabs kyi kun du dga' ba'i byang chub
T02D2534:136a-24: kyi bdag nyid du gyur pas bde ba chen po'o
T02D2534:136a-25: // de rnams dang bdag nyid rgyun mi 'chad pa

T02D2534:136a-27: bar gyur pas na dga' chen po'o //
T02D2534:136a-28: de nyid du tshad med cing rgyun mi 'chad pa'i
T02D2534:136a-29: dga' ba dang bde ba rab tu 'phel ba'i mthar
T02D2534:136a-30: thug pa ni mgu ba chen po'o //
T02D2534:136a-31: de dag thams cad kyang sgyu ma dang 'dra ba
T02D2534:136a-32: gnyis su med pa'i chos nyid so sor rig pas
T02D2534:136a-33: lhun gyis grub par sems can thams cad kyi don
T02D2534:136a-34: mdzad pa la mkhas pa'i blos bstan pa yin pas
T02D2534:136a-35: log par sgrub par ni mi bya'o //
T02D2534:136a-36: yang dag par sgrub pa'am rnal 'byor rgyud kyi rjes
T02D2534:136a-37: su 'brang ba las rang nyid kyis rtogs par bya
T02D2534:136a-38: yi / rang dags [?] log par brtag par ni mi bya'o //
T02D2534:136a-39: da ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i sgo nas khyad par du byas pa ni /
T02D2534:136a-40: gzugs che lus kyang che ba ste //
T02D2534:136a-41: kho dog chen zhing lus bong che //
T02D2534:136a-42: zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin te /
T02D2534:136a-43: de la gzugs che ba ni skye bo rnams gdul
T02D2534:136a-44: bar bya ba'i phyir sna tshogs gzugs can gyis 'gro
T02D2534:136a-45: ba 'dul ba'i dbang gis gzugs sna tshogs pa'i tshul
T02D2534:136a-46: dang ldan par bdag nyid kyi dngos po sprul zhing
T02D2534:136a-47: 'gro ba thams cad khyab cing che ba'i gzugs bas
T02D2534:136b-0: ji ltar @136b tshad phra rab dang che ba la
T02D2534:136b-1: sogs pa'i gzugs can gyi gdul ba'i sems can rnams
T02D2534:136b-2: gdul bar bya ba'i phyir lha la sogs pa bas
T02D2534:136b-3: lhag par che ba'i su ston pas na lus kyang
T02D2534:136b-4: che ba ste / lus kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas lus che ba'o //
T02D2534:136b-10: 'dren ma'i kha dog gi shin tu 'bar bas na kha dog chen po ste /
T02D2534:136b-11: 'di la kha dog chen po mnga' bas na kha dog che ba'o //
T02D2534:136b-12: de yang kha dog gis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams gdul bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2534:136b-13: lus kyi sku'i mdangs 'od 'bar ba ste /
T02D2534:136b-14: rang gi 'od kyis lha la sogs pa'i mdangs zil
T02D2534:136b-15: gyis gnon pas na lus bong chen po mnga' ba
T02D2534:136b-16: ste / de yang lus po'i che ba'i gdul bya dag 'dul ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2534:136b-17: 'od la sogs pa khyad par du 'gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2534:136b-18: ming yang che zhing rgya che ba //
T02D2534:136b-19: dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa yin //
T02D2534:136b-21: gang la ming chen po yod pa de la de skad ces bya ste ;
T02D2534:136b-22: 'jig rten thams cad kyi skad dang rjes su mthun
T02D2534:136b-23: pa'i ming dang brda dang tha snyad du btags pas
T02D2534:136b-24: rab tu grangs pa'i phyir ming yang che ba'o //
T02D2534:136b-25: sbyin pa la sogs pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs mang
T02D2534:136b-26: zhing rgya che ba mnga' bas na rgya che ba'o
T02D2534:136b-27: // 'do zer gyi tshogs kyis zlum por bskor bas na dkyil 'khor chen po'o //
T02D2534:136b-28: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab pas yangs pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor mnga' bas na /
T02D2534:136b-29: dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa yin //
T02D2534:136b-31: mtshon chas khyad par du 'gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D2534:136b-32: shes rab mtshon chen 'chang ba ste //
T02D2534:136b-33: nyon mongs chen po lcags kyu mchog //
T02D2534:136b-35: chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par
T02D2534:136b-36: rtogs pa'i tshul gyi nges par 'byed pa'i shes rab
T02D2534:136b-38: thos pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid ma yin no //
T02D2534:136b-39: de nyid ni mtshon cha ste /
T02D2534:136b-40: nye bar dmigs pa la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa sel bar byed pas na mtshon no //
T02D2534:136b-42: yang man shes rab dang mtshon cha dag ni shes rab mtshon cha ste /
T02D2534:136b-43: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam
T02D2534:136b-44: dang ral gri phyag g-yon dang g-yas na bsnams pa'i
T02D2534:136b-45: rdo rje rnon po'i ting nge 'dzin yin pas na
T02D2534:137a-0: glang po che myos pa dang 'dra bar bzlog par dka' zhing che ba'i @137a * //
T02D2534:137a-1: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyan mongs pa bzlog nas
T02D2534:137a-2: rang dbang du mdzad pas lcags kyu dang 'dra ba'i
T02D2534:137a-3: phyir lcags kyu'o // mchog ni gtso bo'o //
T02D2534:137a-4: 'dir yang lcags kyu smos pa ni nye bar mtshon pa'i don tsam du zad do //
T02D2534:137a-5: des na gzhag pa yang gzung bar bya ste /
T02D2534:137a-6: de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam dang /
T02D2534:137a-9: lcags kyu bsnams pa'i rje btsun rdo rje rnon po
T02D2534:137a-10: nyid 'dod pa chen po zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2534:137a-11: pa'i khyad par gyis phul du byung bar blta bar
T02D2534:137a-12: bya'o // phyi dang nang gi grangs pa dang ye
T02D2534:137a-13: shes kyi bye brag gis khyad par du gyur pa
T02D2534:137a-15: grags chen snyan grangs chen po ste //
T02D2534:137a-16: snang ba chen po gsal ba che //
T02D2534:137a-18: gang la grangs pa chen po yod pa de ni grangs pa chen po'o //
T02D2534:137a-19: shes rab dang rtogs pa dang ye shes kyi shin
T02D2534:137a-20: tu phul du byung bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i
T02D2534:137a-21: phyir grags pa chen mo mnga' bas na grags chen
T02D2534:137a-22: / cho 'phrul shin tu rmad du byung ba sna
T02D2534:137a-23: tshogs pas phyi rol gyi grags pa'i gnas su nye
T02D2534:137a-24: bar mtshon par gyur pas snyan grags chen po'o //
T02D2534:137a-25: nang gi sems kyi snang ba dang ldan pa'i tshul can bas snang ba chen mo'o //
T02D2534:137a-26: gsal ba chen po dang ldan pa ste /
T02D2534:137a-27: phyi rol du 'do zer gyis kun nas bskor ba'i rang bzhin mnga' ba ste gsal ba che ba'o //
T02D2534:137a-28: sprul pa'i sgo'i khyad par du gyur par bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2534:137a-30: sgyu 'phrul chen po'i don grub pa //
T02D2534:137a-31: sgyu 'phrul chen po'i dga' bas dga' //
T02D2534:137a-34: skye bo rnams la ji ltar sdug pa de lta
T02D2534:137a-35: bu'i rang bzhin can gyi sku ston par mdzad pas
T02D2534:137a-36: na mkhas pa'o // gdul bya'i sems can ji ltar 'dul ba dang /
T02D2534:137a-37: rjes su mthun pa'i gzugs su sprul pa ste /
T02D2534:137a-38: de lta bu'i sgyu 'phrul mnga' bas na sgyu 'phrul chen po 'chang ngo //
T02D2534:137a-39: sems can dang ngan song rnams ni dngos po med
T02D2534:137a-40: pa nyid de de lta na yang sgyu 'phrul chen
T02D2534:137a-42: gdul bya'i sems can sangs rgyas nyid la rab tu
T02D2534:137a-43: 'jog pa de sgrub par mdzad pas na sgyu 'phrul
T02D2534:137a-44: chen po'i don du grub pa'o //
T02D2534:137a-45: rnam pa thams cad du sems can gyi don mdzad
T02D2534:137a-46: pa la mngon par dgye pas sgyu 'phrul chen po'i
T02D2534:137a-47: dga' ba la dgyes pas sgyu 'phrul chen po dga'
T02D2534:137b-0: bas @137b dga'o ; / de nyid kyi phyir /
T02D2534:137b-3: da ni sa bcu la bzhugs shing sbyin pa la
T02D2534:137b-4: sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i yon tan
T02D2534:137b-5: gyi rang gi ngo bos shin tu phul du byung
T02D2534:137b-6: ba'i bdag nyid chen pos khyad par du 'phags par
T02D2534:137b-7: bstan pa'i phyir / sbyin bdag chen po gtso bo ste /
T02D2534:137b-8: tshul khrims chen po 'chang ba'i mchog / bzod chen 'chang ba brtan pa po //
T02D2534:137b-9: brtson 'grus chen po brtul ba yin //
T02D2534:137b-10: bsam gtan chen po ting nge 'dzin gnas //
T02D2534:137b-11: shes rab chen po lus 'chang ba //
T02D2534:137b-12: stobs po che la thams cad che ba //
T02D2534:137b-13: smon lam ye shes rgya mtsho ste //
T02D2534:137b-15: de la byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga'
T02D2534:137b-16: ba ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
T02D2534:137b-17: lhag par spyad pas na de la bzhugs te /
T02D2534:137b-18: sbyin pa'i las tshad med pa mdzad pas na /
T02D2534:137b-19: de yang blo gros mi zad pas bstan pa'i mdo las /
T02D2534:137b-20: btsun pa shar dva ti'i bu byang chub smes dpa'
T02D2534:137b-21: rnams kyi sbyin pa yongs su sbyang ba tshad med
T02D2534:137b-26: kha dog nye bar bstan pa'i phyir zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas sbyin pa'o //
T02D2534:137b-28: sred pa thams cad bsal ba'i phyir ba 'dod pa rnams la btung ba sbyin pa'o //
T02D2534:137b-29: bde ba dang 'byor ba'i dngos po thams cad bsdu
T02D2534:137b-30: ba'i phyir bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la bzhon pa

T02D2534:137b-32: pa dang gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i mdog yongs
T02D2534:137b-33: su sbyang ba'i phyir gos 'dod pa rnams la gos
T02D2534:137b-34: sbyin pa'o // sbyin pa'o // de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T02D2534:137b-35: lha'i spyan yongs su gzigs par bya ba'i phyir mar
T02D2534:137b-36: 'dod pa rnams la mar me sbyin pa'o //
T02D2534:137b-37: de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i snyan yongs su dag par
T02D2534:137b-38: bya ba'i phyir rol mos sgra 'dod pa rnams la
T02D2534:137b-40: tshul khrims dang thos pa dang ting nge 'dzin gyi
T02D2534:137b-41: spos kyis byug pa'i phyir spos dang byug pa sbyin
T02D2534:137b-42: pa'o // gzung dang spobs pa dang byang chub kyi
T02D2534:137b-43: yang lag gi me tog thob par bya ba'i phyir
T02D2534:137b-44: me tog phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la me tog
T02D2534:137b-46: lus kyi dri yid du 'ong ba thob par bya
T02D2534:137b-47: ba'i phyir phye ma 'dod pa rnams la phye ma

T02D2534:138a-0: sbyin pa'o // pa'o // sems can thams cad kyi gnas dang skyabs dang mgon dang @138a * //
T02D2534:138a-1: dpung gnyen bya ba'i phyir gnas 'dod pa rnams la gnas sbyin pa'o //
T02D2534:138a-2: sgrib pa thams cad rab tu spang ba dang /

T02D2534:138a-9: thob par bya ba'i phyir stan 'dod pa rnams la

T02D2534:154b-2: bya'o // tshig go // de ni tshul gyi tshig go //

T02D2534:154b-10: rigs pas ji ltar gnas pa bzhin mthong de ltar
T02D2534:154b-11: mthong ni tshul bzhin mthong ba'o //
T02D2534:154b-12: 'khor ba'i khams kyi tshul bzhin gang yin pa mya
T02D2534:154b-13: ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi tshul yang de yin
T02D2534:154b-14: no zhes gang gis de ltar mtshungs shing bye brag
T02D2534:154b-15: med pa mthong bde ni tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor
T02D2534:154b-16: ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2534:154b-17: gang de ltar chos kyi rnam ba dang /
T02D2534:154b-19: tshul bzhin la 'jug pa'i sbyor ba'i rgyu mthun pa de ni shes rab ces bya'o //
T02D2534:154b-20: de ltar de lta bu'i rnam pa'i shes rab gang
T02D2534:154b-21: yin pa de nges par 'byed pa'i shes rab ste

T02D2534:154b-23: shes rab chen po lus 'chang ba //
T02D2534:154b-25: dpal ldan rdo rje snying po'i rgyan las kyang /

T02D2534:154b-27: rdo rje rno na por de bshad do //
T02D2534:154b-29: byang chub sems dpa'i sa ring du song ba la
T02D2534:154b-30: ni thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la lhag
T02D2534:154b-31: bar spyod pas na thabs chen te /

T02D2534:154b-36: sems can yang mi dmigs la /
T02D2534:154b-37: rtag tu sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i brtson pa yang spyod do //
T02D2534:154b-38: nyon mongs pa yang mi dmigs la /
T02D2534:154b-39: rtag tu dbang po rnams sbed pa la yang spyod do //

T02D2534:155a-4: par sgrub ste / 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i thabs sgrub pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2534:155a-5: gzhan gyi don la 'jug pa thams cad ni thabs kyi nang du 'dus pa'o //
T02D2534:155a-6: de lta bu'i thabs chen po dang ldan pa ni 'jam pa'i dbyangs so //
T02D2534:155a-7: byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g-yo ba la ni

T02D2534:155a-13: pa las sngon bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i dbyangs 'khor

T02D2534:155a-15: gyur pa na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa

T02D2534:155a-19: bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cus yongs
T02D2534:155a-20: su bskor cing mdun du bdar te /

T02D2534:155a-22: kyi rgyal po ga la ba der dong ste lhags
T02D2534:155a-23: nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos
T02D2534:155a-24: phyag 'tshal te / bcom ldan 'das de la bdun bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de /
T02D2534:155a-25: rigs kyi bu de nas rgal po nam mkha' zhes
T02D2534:155a-26: bya ba des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2534:155a-27: 'brug sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po ga la ba de
T02D2534:155a-28: logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan
T02D2534:155a-29: 'das la tshigs su bcang de gsol pa /
T02D2534:155a-30: khyod kyi zhal sngar chos dam zhu //

T02D2534:155b-27: smon lam ji ltar btab tshul du //

T02D2534:155b-34: khyod kyang yang dag sangs rgyas 'gyur //

T02D2534:155b-44: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do //

T02D2534:155b-48: bdag gis 'dod chags sems bskyed na //

T02D2534:156a-22: bdag gis bden tshig gang brjod pa //

T02D2534:156a-24: bden pa des ni mkha' dbyings las //

T02D2534:156a-27: mand'a ra yi me tog bzang //
T02D2534:156a-28: bden pa des ni char du phob //
T02D2534:156a-29: yang dag don du nges pa yi //
T02D2534:156a-30: tshig bden de skad brjod pa dang //
T02D2534:156a-31: phyogs bcu mtha' yas thams cad kyi /
T02D2534:156a-32: bye ba'i zhing rnams rab tu g-yos //

T02D2534:156a-34: sil snyan bye pa'i sgra yang byung //
T02D2534:156a-35: me tog mand'a ra ba dag / mi 'greng bdun srid bab par gyur //
T02D2534:156a-36: rgyal po de yi rjes su bslabs te //
T02D2534:156a-37: srog chags bye ba nyi shu yis //

T02D2534:156a-39: yid du 'ong ba'i sgra yang bsgrags //
T02D2534:156a-41: gzhan yang de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02D2534:156a-42: bcom ldan 'das bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya
T02D2534:156a-43: stong grangs ma mchis pa nas nye bar bzung ste
T02D2534:156a-44: / bdag gis smon lam btab pa ni //
T02D2534:156a-45: nam bdag gis phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i
T02D2534:156a-46: 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrib
T02D2534:156a-48: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa de
T02D2534:156a-49: dag thams cad bdag gis byang chub la yang dag

T02D2534:156b-1: de bzhin du bdag gis tshul khrims dang /
T02D2534:156b-5: shes rab la yang dag par btsud pa dang /

T02D2534:156b-17: bar bya'o zhes bgyi bar smon lam btab bo //

T02D2534:166b-19: yongs su gdung ba med cing lus dang sems bde ba bskyed pa ste /
T02D2534:166b-20: gzhan gyis gnod par bya ba las shin tu 'das pa'o //
T02D2534:166b-21: nyes pa thams cad kyi 'jigs pa dang bral ba ste /
T02D2534:166b-22: 'phags pa'i lam dang mthun zhing gzhi ba dang /
T02D2534:166b-23: sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'i sems can rnam dang bar byed pa //
T02D2534:166b-24: yul thams cad las sgrol ba ste /
T02D2534:166b-26: mtshon cha 'chang ba ma yin no //
T02D2534:166b-27: sems can thams cad rab tu thar par bya ba la dga' ba /
T02D2534:166b-28: khong khro ba thams cad dang bral ba /
T02D2534:166b-31: thob kyis 'jal ba thams cad dang bral ba rnyed pa dang /
T02D2534:166b-33: tshigs su bcad pa thams cad 'byung bar byed pa /
T02D2534:166b-36: 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis phyag byas pa /
T02D2534:166b-37: rang gi gzi brjid kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
T02D2534:166b-38: mkhas pas rab tu bsngags pa /
T02D2534:166b-39: byis pa thams cad srung ba /
T02D2534:166b-40: tshangs pa'i lam dang mthun pa ;
T02D2534:166b-42: sems can thams cad kyi thar pa'i lam gyi mchog theg pa thams cad yang dag par bsdus pa /
T02D2534:166b-43: zang zing med pa'i bsod nams kyis bzung ba /
T02D2534:166b-44: bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad bsags pa /
T02D2534:167a-0: rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams @167a * //
T02D2534:167a-1: bya ba'i dngos po thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa /
T02D2534:167a-2: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
T02D2534:167a-3: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa /
T02D2534:167a-4: dbang po nyams pa dang ma tshang ba cad spangs pa /
T02D2534:167a-5: bde 'gro thams cad dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam dang mthun pa /
T02D2534:167a-6: ngan songs thams cad dang mi khom pa brgyad las 'das pa /
T02D2534:167a-7: chos kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing mos pa /
T02D2534:167a-8: 'dod pa dang longs spyod kyi dbang phyug la mngon par dga' ba med pa /
T02D2534:167a-9: sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa dang /
T02D2534:167a-10: sbyin pa'i sbyor ba tha dad pa dang bral ba
T02D2534:167a-11: tshul khrims dang bslab pa thams cad kyi sgo dang
T02D2534:167a-12: / tshul khrims 'chal pa thams cad yongs su skyob pa /
T02D2534:167a-16: dregs pa thams cad dang bral ba /
T02D2534:167a-17: 'phags pa rnams 'jug pa'i bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02D2534:167a-18: snyoms par 'jug pa'i rtsa ba mi 'khrugs pa'i brtson 'grus brtsams shing yang dag par sbyor ba /
T02D2534:167a-19: bya ba thams cad las yang dag par grol ba /
T02D2534:167a-23: snyoms par 'jug pas nyon mongs pa thams cad las nges par 'byung ba /
T02D2534:167a-24: gsang sngags dang thos pa 'dzin pas nges par sems pa'i shes rab kyi rgyu bskyed pa /
T02D2534:167a-25: rang gi phyogs dang gzhan gyi phyogs la nges pa /
T02D2534:167a-26: bdud kyi phyogs dang nyon mongs pa rnams bsal ba /
T02D2534:167a-28: bsnyen bkra dang 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshun pa la sems pa /
T02D2534:167a-29: spyod lam srung bar byed pa /
T02D2534:167a-30: rgod pa thams cad las 'das pa /
T02D2534:167a-31: nga rgyal gyi las sel ba /
T02D2534:167a-32: ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pas phyugs shing
T02D2534:167a-33: bag chags dang mtshams sbyor ba dang nyon mongs pa'i
T02D2534:167a-35: btsun pa sha ra dva ti'i bu byams pa dri zhim pa dang /
T02D2534:167a-36: sems can thams cad yongs skyob pa ste byams pa
T02D2534:167a-37: chen po ni bdag gi bde ba gtong zhing sems
T02D2534:167a-38: can rnams la bde ba sbyin pa'o //
T02D2534:167a-39: nyan thos kyi byams pa ni bdag skyob pa'o //
T02D2534:167a-40: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa chen po ni sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa'o //
T02D2534:167a-41: btsun pa sha ra dva ti'i bu byams pa ni chu bo las sgrol ba'o //
T02D2534:167b-0: btsun pa @167b sha ra dva ti'i bu byams pa ni gsum po 'di dag ste /
T02D2534:167b-1: gsum gang zhe na 'di lta ste /
T02D2534:167b-2: sems can la dmigs pa'i byams pa dang /
T02D2534:167b-3: chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa dang /
T02D2534:167b-4: dmigs pa med pa'i byams pa'o //
T02D2534:167b-5: sems can la dmigs pa'i byams pa ni sems dang pos bskyed pa'i byas chub sems dpa' rams kyi'o //
T02D2534:167b-6: chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa ni spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi'o //
T02D2534:167b-7: dmigs pa med pa'i byams pa ni mi skye ba'i
T02D2534:167b-8: chos la bzod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
T02D2534:167b-9: ste / btsun pa sha ra da ti'i bu 'di
T02D2534:167b-10: ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa mi
T02D2534:167b-12: de bas na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa mi
T02D2534:167b-13: zad pa ji skad gsungs pa de lta bu'i byams
T02D2534:167b-14: pa'i ngo bo nyid du 'gyur bas /
T02D2534:167b-15: byams chen rang bzhin dpag tu med //
T02D2534:167b-17: thugs rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid du bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2534:167b-18: snying rje chen po blo yi mchog / ces bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2534:167b-19: thugs rje chen pos brlan pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas snying rje chen po'o //
T02D2534:167b-20: 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni shes rab kyi mchog yin pas blo yi mchog go //
T02D2534:167b-21: 'di yang byams pa bzhin du sems can dpag tu med pa la dmigs par brjod par bya'o //
T02D2534:167b-22: de bas na snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro
T02D2534:167b-23: ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gzhan don
T02D2534:167b-24: gyi phyir tshogs thams cad nye bar stsogs par 'gyur
T02D2534:167b-25: ba ste / de yang btsun pa sha ra dva
T02D2534:167b-26: ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
T02D2534:167b-27: snying rje chen po yang mi zad pa ste /
T02D2534:167b-30: btsun pa sha ra dva ti'i bu 'di lta ste /
T02D2534:167b-31: dper na dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub ba ni skyes bu'i srog gi dbang po'i sngon du 'gro ba'o //
T02D2534:167b-32: de bzhin du theg pa chen po yang dag par
T02D2534:167b-33: bsgrub pa'i phyir byang chub sme dpa'i snying rje che
T02D2534:167b-36: dper na 'khor los sgyur pa'i rgyal po'i 'khor lo
T02D2534:167b-37: rin po che ni rin po che sna bdun gyi
T02D2534:167b-39: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams thams cad
T02D2534:167b-40: ma mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par sgrub pa
T02D2534:167b-41: la snying rje chen po ni sngon du 'gro bya'o
T02D2534:168a-0: dper na tshongs dpon nam khyim bdag zhig bu gcig la snying thag pa nas sdug @168a * //
T02D2534:168a-1: par 'dzin pa de bzhin du snying rje chen po
T02D2534:168a-2: la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang
T02D2534:168a-3: sems can thams cad la snying thag pa nas sdug
T02D2534:168a-5: btsun pa sha ra dva ti'i bu snying rje chen
T02D2534:168a-6: po zhes bya ba ni 'di bag nyid kyis byas
T02D2534:168a-7: pas na de'i phyir snying rje chen po zhes bya'o
T02D2534:168a-8: ; / rang gis byas pas na snying rje chen po'o //
T02D2534:168a-9: gzhan gyi skabs mi rnyed pas na snying rje chen po'o zhes bya ba las gos pa ste /
T02D2534:168a-10: gang gi phyir de lta bu ni snying rje chen
T02D2534:168a-11: po'o ngo bo nyid yin la bcom ldan 'das kyang
T02D2534:168a-13: nges pa 'byung ba thams cad kyi rgyu yin pas shes par bya ste ;
T02D2534:168a-14: de bas na blo'i mchog ces bya'o //
T02D2534:168a-15: shes rab chen po blo chen ldan //
T02D2534:168a-16: zhes bya ba ni dga' ba chen po'i ngo bo nyid bstan pa yin te /
T02D2534:168a-17: de la dga' ba chen po gang zhe na /
T02D2534:168a-18: gang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dran pa dang /
T02D2534:168a-19: rjes su dran pa dang dga' ba dang mos pa dang /
T02D2534:168a-20: mchog tu dga' ba de la ni dga' ba zhes bya ste /
T02D2534:168a-21: chos thams cad khong du chud pas dga' bar 'gyur
T02D2534:168a-22: pa de ni shes rab med na mi 'byung bas
T02D2534:168a-23: shes rab nyid rgyu yin te de bas na shes
T02D2534:168a-24: rab chen po zhes bya ste /
T02D2534:168a-25: gang la shes rab chen po yod pa de mo shes rab chen po'o //
T02D2534:168a-26: rab tu dga' ba'i shes rab brnyes nas kyang sems
T02D2534:168a-27: can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa la thugs gzhol
T02D2534:168a-28: bas na blo chen ldan zhes bya ste /
T02D2534:168a-29: dri ma med pa'i blo gros ni blo'o //
T02D2534:168a-30: yul thams cad pa ni che bas te /
T02D2534:168a-31: de lta bu'i shes rab gang la mnga' ba de ni blo chen ldan zhes bya'o //
T02D2534:168a-32: de la dga' ba dang de'i ngo bo nyid brjod par bya ste /
T02D2534:168a-33: de yang sems mi 'gong zhing mi brdzi ba dang /
T02D2534:168a-35: 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad gtong ba dang /
T02D2534:168a-36: chos kyi dga' ba thams cad kyi rten dang /
T02D2534:168a-37: sems mchog tu dga' ba dang /
T02D2534:168a-38: lus rab tu sems pa dang /
T02D2534:168a-39: sangs rgyas la dga' zhing yi rang ba dang /
T02D2534:168a-40: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la dga' zhing mos pas
T02D2534:168a-41: mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i rgyan tshol ba lam
T02D2534:168a-42: mkhas pa dang / dge ba'i chos nyan pas mi skyo ba dang /
T02D2534:168a-43: de kho na'i chos la rton pa'i nan tan dang /
T02D2534:168a-47: rab tu dga' bas chos la mos pa dang /
T02D2534:168b-0: rtag tu rgyun @168b mi 'chad par sems can rnams la khong khro ba med pa'i blo dang /
T02D2534:168b-1: sangs rgyas kyi chos tshol ba la shin tu 'dun pa dang /
T02D2534:168b-2: chos la 'dun pa yang mi 'dor ba dang /
T02D2534:168b-3: sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po dag la mos shin rnam par grol ba dang /
T02D2534:168b-4: nyi tshe ba'i theg pa bsal te sems bskyed pa dang /
T02D2534:168b-5: ser sna med pas ma zhum par sems bskyed pa dang /
T02D2534:168b-6: slong ba la sbyin pa byin nas 'khor gsum yongs su dag par sbyangs pa dang /
T02D2534:168b-7: sbyin pa la mchog tu dga' ba dang /
T02D2534:168b-8: tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams la dad pa dang /
T02D2534:168b-9: tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams la rjes su 'dzin cing byams pa dang ;
T02D2534:168b-10: rang tshul khrims yongs su dag pas ngan 'gro'i 'jigs
T02D2534:168b-11: pa thams cad las shin tu 'da' bar dbugs 'byin
T02D2534:168b-12: pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims la yongs su bsdo ba dang /
T02D2534:168b-13: brtan zhing mi phyed pa dang /
T02D2534:168b-14: pha rol dang du brjod pa dang /
T02D2534:168b-15: ngan du smra ba'i tshig gi lam la khong khro
T02D2534:168b-16: ba med pa'i sems kyis bzod cing nges pa dang
T02D2534:168b-18: bla ma la 'dud cing ri mor byed pa dang /
T02D2534:168b-24: thob kyis 'jal ba med pa dang ;
T02D2534:168b-26: sems la brlang ba med pa dang /
T02D2534:168b-28: thams cad la phan yon du lta ba dang /
T02D2534:168b-29: skyon med par lta ba dang /
T02D2534:168b-30: ltung ba mi gleng ba dang /
T02D2534:168b-31: yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba'i chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa dang /
T02D2534:168b-32: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ston pa ltar phangs su 'dzin pa dang /
T02D2534:168b-33: chos rnams la bdag bzhin du phangs su 'dzin pa dang /
T02D2534:168b-34: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la srog bzhin du phangs su 'dzin pa dang /
T02D2534:168b-35: bla ma rnams la pha ma bzhin du phang su 'dzin pa de nag /
T02D2534:168b-36: sems can rnams la bu bzhin du phangs su 'dzin pa dang /
T02D2534:168b-37: mkhan po dang slob dpon rnams la sangs rgyas bzhin du phangs su 'dzin pa dang /
T02D2534:168b-38: nan tan rnams la yang lag gi dam pa mgo bzhin du phangs su 'dzin pa dang /
T02D2534:168b-39: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la rkang lag bzhin du phangs su 'dzin pa dang /
T02D2534:169a-0: chos smra ba rnas la rin po che thams cad bzhin du @169a * //
T02D2534:169a-2: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thams cad la yid bzhin
T02D2534:169a-3: gyi nor bu bzhin du phangs su 'dzin pa dang
T02D2534:169a-4: / rjes su bstan pa rnams la dga' ba'i rtse mo bzhin du phangs su 'dzin pa dang /
T02D2534:169a-5: chos shes pa rnams la nad med pa bzhin du phangs su 'dzin pa dang /
T02D2534:169a-6: chos 'tshal ba rnams la sman bzhin du phangs su 'dzin pa dang /
T02D2534:169a-7: bskul zhing dran par byed pa rnams la sman pa bzhin du sangs rgyas su 'dzin pa ste /
T02D2534:169a-8: btsun pa sha ra dva ti'i bu de ltar gang
T02D2534:169a-9: dbang po thams cad la dbang po 'gong ba 'di
T02D2534:169a-10: ni dga' ba chen po zhes bya'o //
T02D2534:169a-11: dga' ba chen po zhes bya ba ni rtog pa'i ye shes kyi phyir zhi ba'i rnam pa'o //
T02D2534:169a-12: mi rgod pa'i phyir rab tu zhi ba'i rnam pa'o //
T02D2534:169a-13: khengs pa ma yin pa'i phyir shin tu sbyangs pa'i rnam pa'o //
T02D2534:169a-14: rnam par mi g-yeng ba'i phyir dbang po dga' ba'i rnam pa'o //
T02D2534:169a-15: mi nyams pa'i phyir brtul zhugs kyi rnam pa'o //
T02D2534:169a-16: 'dod ba'i phyir nges pa'i rnam pa'o //
T02D2534:169a-17: bka' blo bde ba'i phyir thos pa'i rnam pa'o //
T02D2534:169a-18: sems las su rung ba'i phyir nye bar zhi ba'i rnam pa'o //
T02D2534:169a-19: las legs par byas pa'i phyir dga' ba'i rnam pa'o //
T02D2534:169a-20: kha nam tho ba med pa'i phyir mi 'gyod pa'i rnam pa'o //
T02D2534:169a-21: ma g-yos pa'i phyir shin tu gnas pa'i rnam pa'o ;
T02D2534:169a-22: / mi gnas pa'i phyir ma g-yos pa'i rnam pa'o //
T02D2534:169a-23: thul bar dka' ba'i phyir bsnyen dka' ba'i rna pa'o //
T02D2534:169a-24: chud mi za ba'i phyir don gyi rna pa'o //
T02D2534:169a-25: ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi phyir bden pa'i rnam pa'o //
T02D2534:169a-26: de byed pa'i phyir de kho na'i rnam pa'o //
T02D2534:169a-27: stobs kyi phyir spro ba'i rna pa'o //
T02D2534:169a-28: mi brdzi ba'i phyir stobs kyi rnam pa'o //
T02D2534:169a-29: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag pa ji
T02D2534:169a-30: lta ba bzhin du tshol bas mi skyo ba'i phyir
T02D2534:169a-31: sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i
T02D2534:169a-32: rnam pa sta / de lta bu'i dga' ba'i ngo
T02D2534:169a-33: bo ni bcom ldan 'das yin zhe ston par 'gyur
T02D2534:169a-34: rnam pa sta / ro // mkhas pa chen po thabs che ba //
T02D2534:169a-35: zhes bya ba ni btang snyoms chen po'i ngo bo
T02D2534:169a-36: nyid du bstan par bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin
T02D2534:169a-37: te / de yang thabs chen po gang la mnga' ba de ni thabs che po zhes bya'o //
T02D2534:169a-38: gnas skabs 'dir btang snyoms chen po ni thabs che po ste /
T02D2534:169b-0: bsam pa sna tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i @169b gdul bya'i sems can rnams 'dul ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2534:169b-1: de yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi btang snyoms rnam pa gsum ste /
T02D2534:169b-4: nyon mongs pa la btang snyoms pa dang /
T02D2534:169b-5: bdag dang gzhan srung ba'i btang snyoms dang /
T02D2534:169b-6: dus dang dus ma yin pa la btang snyoms pa'o ;
T02D2534:169b-7: / de la nyon mongs pa la btang snyoms pa
T02D2534:169b-8: ni ste stang du byas pas mthos par mi sems
T02D2534:169b-9: dpa' dang / bsti stang du ma byas pas dmas par mi sems da dang /
T02D2534:169b-10: rnyed pa dag pa rlom sems med pa dang /
T02D2534:169b-11: ma rnyed pa dag la yi chad pa med pa dang /
T02D2534:169b-12: snyan pa dag la mngon par dga' ba med pa dang /
T02D2534:169b-13: mi snyan pa la zhum pa med pa dang /
T02D2534:169b-14: smad pas sro shi bar mi 'gyur ba dang /
T02D2534:169b-15: bsngags pa la chos nyid rab tu gnas pa dang /
T02D2534:169b-16: sdug bsngal dag la so sor rtog pa'i stobs dang //
T02D2534:169b-17: bde ba dag la mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal bar rtog pa'i stobs pang //
T02D2534:169b-18: rjes su chags pa 'dor ba dang /
T02D2534:169b-19: khong khro ba spod pas mdza' ba dang /
T02D2534:169b-20: mi mdza' ba dag la sems mnyam pa dang /
T02D2534:169b-21: tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams la blo mnyam pa dang /
T02D2534:169b-22: legs par byas pa dag dang nyes par byas pa rnam sla yang gnyis su mi byed pa dang /
T02D2534:169b-23: sdug pa dang mi sdug par mi lta ba dang /
T02D2534:169b-24: legs par thos pa de yang nyes par thos pa la mi 'byed pa dang /
T02D2534:169b-25: legs par smras pa dang nyes par smra ba la bag la nyal med pa dang /
T02D2534:169b-26: ro myong ba'i nyes dmigs la rnams la mtshungs par yongs su 'jal ba dang /
T02D2534:169b-27: sems can thams cad la bsam pa mnyam po dang /
T02D2534:169b-28: lus dang srog la mi lta ba dang /
T02D2534:169b-29: rab dang 'bring dang tha ma rnams la 'du shes mnyam pa dang /
T02D2534:169b-30: bsngags pa dang bsngags pa ma yin pa rnams la sems mnyam pa dang /
T02D2534:169b-31: bde ba dang me bde ba rnams la rang gi sems yongs su dag pa ste /
T02D2534:169b-32: btsun pa shar dva ti'i bu de ltar gang bsti stang du byed pa dang /
T02D2534:169b-33: gnod par byed la mthon dmad du mi sems shir /
T02D2534:169b-34: de la byang chub sems dpa' btang snyoms ba yin te /
T02D2534:169b-35: bcun ba sha ra d'a ti'i bu 'di ni byang
T02D2534:169b-36: chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nyon mongs pa la btang
T02D2534:170a-0: de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdag dang zhan bsrung ba'i btang snyoms @170a * //
T02D2534:170a-2: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' lus dang yan lag
T02D2534:170a-3: dang zhing lag rnams cad kyang khong khro bar mi
T02D2534:170a-4: byed cing mi tshol te btang snyoms pa yin no
T02D2534:170a-5: // lus kyi rnam par 'gyur pa las sam /
T02D2534:170a-6: ngag gi rnam par 'gyur pa las kyang rung ste /

T02D2534:170a-8: mig gi rnam pas kyang rma mi phyin /

T02D2534:170a-10: gnyis kas kyang rma mi phyin to //

T02D2534:170a-36: dpa' thams cad du btang snyoms bya bar bka' mi

T02D2534:199b-15: gang gi phyir rnam par rtog pa ni mi rigs te /
T02D2534:199b-16: de ni rang nyid phyin ci log yin pa'i rigs pa 'dis na mi srid do //
T02D2534:199b-17: de ltar na ji ltar bcom ldan 'das chos ston
T02D2534:199b-18: par mdzad pa na rnam par rtog pa sna tshogs
T02D2534:199b-19: pa la lhag par spyod pa'i tshig ston par mdzad
T02D2534:199b-20: pa dang / de bzhin du 'jig rten las 'das
T02D2534:199b-21: pa'i rjes las thob pa'i dag pa ni 'jig rten

T02D2534:199b-23: 'das chos ston par mdzad do zhes ji ltar lung
T02D2534:199b-24: dang yang 'gal ba med pa yin zhes rtog na

T02D2534:199b-27: theg pa dman pa la mos ba rnams la bya'i
T02D2534:199b-28: don bstan pa de ni gang zag la sogs pa
T02D2534:199b-29: yod par bstan pa dang 'dra bar de dag nyid
T02D2534:199b-30: kyis de ltar brtags pa ni rang gi mos pa'i
T02D2534:199b-31: dbang yin gyi da kho na nyid du ni ma

T02D2534:199b-33: par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i chos kyi

T02D2534:199b-35: brnyes pas bsam pa ji lta ba dang rjes su

T02D2534:199b-37: bya rnams kyi rkyen las byung ba yin la /

T02D2534:199b-39: sgo nas sgra'i tshogs rnam byung par gyur pa shes
T02D2534:199b-40: shing / bcom ldan 'das ni chos rnams ston par

T02D2534:199b-45: skyes bu yid bzhin nor bu ltar //
T02D2534:199b-46: rtsig pa la sogs rnams las kyang //
T02D2534:199b-48: de yi don rnams dpyad nas ni //
T02D2534:199b-49: mi rnams kyis ni kun shes te //
T02D2534:200a-2: myur ba nyid du sbyor bar 'gyur //
T02D2534:200a-5: gtso bo khyod kyis yi ge ni //

T02D2534:200a-8: chos kyi char gyis tshim par mdzad //
T02D2534:200a-10: de bzhin du gzhan dag las kyang //
T02D2534:200a-11: skyob pa mdzad pa mi mnga' yang //
T02D2534:200a-13: tshogs rnams nyid kyi mthu yis na //
T02D2534:200a-14: ston pa la yang 'jug par mdzad //
T02D2534:200a-15: rtsol ba thams cad spangs par ni //
T02D2534:200a-16: nges pa nyid du shes bya ste //
T02D2534:200a-18: de ni rtag tu shes par bya //
T02D2534:200a-19: rnam rtog 'di ni rang nyid dag / ma rig ngo bor gyur pa yi //
T02D2534:200a-20: nang gi rnam pa phyi gzigs kyi //

T02D2534:200a-23: de'i phyir 'di ni yod ma yin //
T02D2534:200a-24: 'dren bya 'jig rten rnam shes dag / mngon sum mdzad nas ston mi mdzad //
T02D2534:200a-25: sangs rgyas rin chen dbang sgyur bas //
T02D2534:200a-26: sna tshogs rin chen bzhin bsam 'das //

T02D2534:200a-28: 'byung bar thub pa rnam par bsam //
T02D2534:200a-29: nga rgyal de yi rjes 'jug rnams //
T02D2534:200a-30: sdud par byed pa'i mkhas rnams kyi //
T02D2534:200a-31: mdo dang chos mngon 'dul ba la /
T02D2534:200a-32: tshig ni de ltar byas pa yin //
T02D2534:200a-33: sangs rgyas rin chen mthu yis na //
T02D2534:200a-34: don rnams sna tshogs ston pa ltar //
T02D2534:200a-35: rkyen gyis ma 'dres par ston pa //

T02D2534:200a-38: khyod kyis gdul byar bya ba rnams //

T02D2534:200a-40: gzhan 'di ji ltar phyi rol bzhin //
T02D2534:200a-41: de 'di yin zhes smra bar byed //
T02D2534:200a-42: gzhan dang gzhan gyi 'di ni de bzhin shes par bya //
T02D2534:200a-43: 'di ltar khong du chud bya ste //
T02D2534:200a-44: gzhan du phyi rol ba yi sgra //
T02D2534:200a-45: ji ltar lta ba po'i dbye bas //
T02D2534:200a-46: dris pa mgu bya ji lta bur //
T02D2534:200a-47: bshad ba dag ni gcig gis kyang //
T02D2534:200a-48: gcig gis 'dzin pa'ang bzlog min na //
T02D2534:200a-49: rgyu rnams kyis ni dbye ba yis //
T02D2534:200a-50: sgra ni mang por gyur pa yin //
T02D2534:200a-51: 'on kyang thub pa chen po yi //
T02D2534:200a-52: gsung gcig du ma'i snang bar ni //
T02D2534:200a-53: de ni du ma'i bdag nyid du //
T02D2534:200a-54: gdul bya rnams kyis go bar gyur //
T02D2534:200a-55: gdul bya rnams la ye shes de //
T02D2534:200a-56: de ltar snang zhing gyur pa yang //
T02D2534:200a-57: gal te phyi don yul rnams ni //
T02D2534:200b-0: thams cad rnam @200b pa gcig tu 'gyur //
T02D2534:200b-1: snang ba du mar gyur pas na //
T02D2534:200b-2: ye shes tsam du rnam par mdzes //
T02D2534:200b-3: sgra ni du ma'i bdag nyid min //
T02D2534:200b-4: gcig dang du mar 'gal ba nyid //
T02D2534:200b-5: gang zhig du mar gyur pa yang /
T02D2534:200b-6: rtog pa nyid du 'gyur pa yin //
T02D2534:200b-7: yul gyi shes pa de nyams pas //
T02D2534:200b-8: shes par bya ba'ang 'dres bar gyur //
T02D2534:200b-9: rgyal bas yi ge gcig tsam yang //
T02D2534:200b-10: cung zad tsam yang ma gsungs te //
T02D2534:200b-11: rnam par mi rtog tshul 'di ni //
T02D2534:200b-12: shin tu mdzes par gyur pa yin //
T02D2534:200b-13: de bas rtog pa kun spangs par //
T02D2534:200b-14: 'di ni gnas par gyur pa yin //
T02D2534:200b-16: gang gi phyir rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa des na /
T02D2534:200b-17: rnam par mi rtog dbyings mi zad //
T02D2534:200b-19: de yang gang yin zhe na /
T02D2534:200b-20: chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2534:200b-22: mchog tu phul du byung bas na dam pa'o //
T02D2534:200b-23: nam yang gzhan du mi 'gyur bas na zad mi shes pa ste /
T02D2534:200b-24: chos kyi dbyings ni zad par yang mi 'gyur la /
T02D2534:200b-25: 'phel bar yang mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa'i phyir
T02D2534:200b-26: 'phel ba dang 'bri ba dang bral bas na chos
T02D2534:200b-28: bsod nams ldan pa bsod nams tshogs //
T02D2534:200b-32: bzod pa ste pha rol tu phyin pa gsum ni bsod nams kyi tshogs so //
T02D2534:200b-33: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D2534:200b-34: thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D2534:200b-35: smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D2534:200b-36: stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D2534:200b-37: ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
T02D2534:200b-38: pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni ye shes kyi tshogs so //
T02D2534:200b-39: brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan ni gnyi gar gtogs so //
T02D2534:200b-40: de la bsod nams dang ldan pa ni rgyu'i gnas skabs su'o //
T02D2534:200b-41: bsod nams kyi tshogs ni 'bras bu'i gnas skabs te /
T02D2534:200b-42: de'i rang bzhin du gyur pas so //
T02D2534:200b-43: ye shes ni ye shes kyi tshogs te rgyu'i gnas skabs so //
T02D2534:200b-44: ye shes kyi gnas ni 'bras bu'i gnas skabs te /
T02D2534:200b-45: ye shes gzhan gyi rgyur gyur pa'i phyir te /
T02D2534:200b-46: ye shes kyi 'byung gnas kyi ye shes kyi che
T02D2534:200b-47: ba nyid ni thams cad du yongs su smin pa'i
T02D2534:200b-48: dbang gis ye shes kyi rgyur gyur pas na ye
T02D2534:200b-50: 'bras bur gyur pa'i ye shes kyis na ye shes dang ldan pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2534:200b-51: yod pa dang med pa dag ni yod med ces bya ste /
T02D2534:200b-52: gnyis po de dag shes pa'i ngang tshul gang la yod pa de ni /
T02D2534:201a-0: @201a * // ye shes ldan pa yod med shes //
T02D2534:201a-2: de ma rtogs pa'i gzung ba dang 'dzin pa thams cad ni med pa ste /
T02D2534:201a-3: rang gi ngo bo nyid shes pa las gzhan mi
T02D2534:201a-4: shes pa'o zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis na de skad

T02D2534:201a-14: rje btsun 'jam dpal gzhan yong pa ma yin no
T02D2534:201a-16: bden pa las gzhan na med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2534:201a-17: de mnga' bas na kun rdzob kyi bden par bshad pa la yang nyes pa med do //
T02D2534:201a-18: de bas na kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i sgo

T02D2534:201a-21: da ni tshigs su bcad pa bcu dgus gsang sngags
T02D2534:201a-22: kyi tshul gyi lha rnams kyi ngo bo nyid dang

T02D2534:201a-27: de dang de'i gzugs kyis bzhugs so zhes bstan par
T02D2534:201a-28: bya ba'i phyir ; rtag pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa ni /
T02D2534:201a-29: rtag pa kun rgyal rnal 'byor can /
T02D2534:201a-30: bsam gtan bsam bya blo ldan bdag / so so rang rig mi g-yo ba //
T02D2534:201a-31: mchog gi dang po sku gsum 'chang /
T02D2534:201a-32: sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can //

T02D2534:201a-35: sangs rgyas thams cad skyed pa po //
T02D2534:201a-36: sangs rgyas sras bo dam pa'i mchog / shes ba srid 'byung skye gnas ma med //
T02D2534:201a-37: chos las byung ba srid pa sel //

T02D2534:201b-3: mchod cing brjod pa drang srong che //

T02D2534:201b-9: 'dzin pa chen po rdo rje zhags //
T02D2534:201b-10: rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che //
T02D2534:201b-12: khro bo'i rgyal po gdong drug 'jigs //
T02D2534:201b-13: mig drug lag drug stobs dang /
T02D2534:201b-15: keng rus mche ba gtsigs pa po //

T02D2534:201b-31: rdo rje h'um ste h'um zhes sgrogs //
T02D2534:201b-32: mtshon du rdo rje'i mda' thogs pa //

T02D2534:201b-37: skra yang rdo rje 'bar ba ste //

T02D2534:201b-44: rdo rje'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste gang rgyangs h'a h'a zhes par sgrogs //
T02D2534:201b-45: yi ge drug pa rdo rje'i sgra //
T02D2534:201b-46: 'jam dbyangs chen po'i sgra che ba //
T02D2534:201b-47: 'jig rten gsum na sgra gcig pa //

T02D2534:201b-51: kyi thams cad du rgyun mi 'chad pa'i gzugs kyis
T02D2534:201b-53: sna tshogs pa ni 'gro ba rnam pa tha dad pa ste /

T02D2534:202a-0: @202a * // don yod par gyur pa'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pas kun rgyal lo //
T02D2534:202a-1: shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid can gyi rnal
T02D2534:202a-2: 'byor 'di la mnga' bas na rnal 'byor can te
T02D2534:202a-3: / 'od dpag tu med pa'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pa'i phyir ro //

T02D2534:202a-5: de yang bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gyis rnam pa thams cad du yongs su rdzogs pa ste /
T02D2534:202a-6: de bas na de nyid ni don dam par rnal
T02D2534:202a-7: 'byor can zhes bya bas las kyi sa la slob
T02D2534:202a-8: par gyur pa na yang nye bar gdags pas rnal

T02D2534:202a-25: bde gshegs dri med shes rab ni //
T02D2534:202a-26: 'jam pa'i dbyangs su de bshad do //
T02D2534:202a-28: dngos dang dngos med rnam dpyad na //
T02D2534:202a-29: sangs rgyas kun la bdag med kyang //
T02D2534:202a-31: ae ma'o chos kyi chos nyid yin //
T02D2534:202a-32: zhes gsungs pas bdag po nyid bstan pas na log par brtag par mi bya'o //
T02D2534:202a-33: gang gi phyir blo dang ldan pa thams cad kyi

T02D2534:202a-36: mchog kyang yin la dang po yang yin pas na mchog gi dang po'o //

T02D2534:202a-39: de thob nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /
T02D2534:202a-40: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /

T02D2534:202a-43: mchog gi dang po'i ngo bo nyid du gyur kyang
T02D2534:202a-44: gal te rang gi ngo bo nyid las nyams par
T02D2534:202b-0: 'gyur ro zhes rtog @202b ba la mi g-yo ba
T02D2534:202b-1: zhes gsungs te / rang gi ngo bo nyid du

T02D2534:202b-10: gtogs par gang gis ji ltar yang rtogs par mi
T02D2534:202b-11: nus / so zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2534:202b-12: gal te thog ma dang tha ma med pa dang /
T02D2534:202b-13: rnam par mi g-yo ba'i ngo bo nyid dang /
T02D2534:202b-14: so so rang rig pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na ji ltar chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang /
T02D2534:202b-15: sprul pa'i sku la sogs pa'i gzugs kyi gzhan yang
T02D2534:202b-16: dag par rtogs par gzhag ces rtog pa bsal bar
T02D2534:202b-17: bya ba'i phyir / sku gsum 'chang zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2534:202b-18: de la de'i dgongs pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D2534:202b-19: so so rang rig pa'i chos nyid kyi bdag nyid
T02D2534:202b-20: can gyi sku la dbang sgyur bas sku gsum du
T02D2534:202b-21: snang ste / gdul bya'i rgyud la yod pa'i rang rig pa'i tshul yang rtogs par mdzad nas /
T02D2534:202b-22: des de rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir sku gsum 'chang zhes bya ba ste //
T02D2534:202b-23: kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa la brten pa yin pas na 'gal ba med do //
T02D2534:202b-24: sku gsum bo de dag kyang yang rnam par lngar dbye bar bya'o zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2534:202b-25: sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can //
T02D2534:202b-27: de yang ngo bo nyid kyi sku dang /
T02D2534:202b-30: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang /
T02D2534:202b-33: chos gang rnam pa thams cad du //
T02D2534:202b-34: rnam dag zag pa med brnyes pa //
T02D2534:202b-35: thub pa'i ngo bo nyid sku ste /
T02D2534:202b-36: de yi rang gi mtshan nyid do ;
T02D2534:202b-38: chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis dri ma med
T02D2534:202b-39: pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas chos nyid kyi de
T02D2534:202b-40: kho na nyid kyi bdag nyid can gyi sku yin
T02D2534:202b-42: chos sku gnyis pa ni chos rnams kyi bdag nyid can te /
T02D2534:202b-43: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la sogs pa nas
T02D2534:202b-44: ji srid du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye
T02D2534:202b-45: shes kyi mthar thug pa'i bar du snang ba'i chos
T02D2534:202b-46: kyi tshul yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2534:202b-47: sems can thams cad kyi don dang bya ba rnams
T02D2534:202b-48: thugs su chung pa'i bdag nyid ni thub pa'i ye
T02D2534:202b-49: shes kyi sku'o // thub mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang //
T02D2534:202b-50: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu 'di //
T02D2534:203a-2: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur 'dod do //
T02D2534:203a-3: zhes bya ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
T02D2534:203a-4: rang gis phan pa sna tshogs pa //
T02D2534:203a-5: 'gro la snyoms par mdzad pa ste //
T02D2534:203a-6: 'khor ba srid du rgyun mi gcod //
T02D2534:203a-7: thub pa'i sbrul pa'i sku yin no //
T02D2534:203a-8: zhes bya ba ni sbrul pa'i sku'o //
T02D2534:203a-9: de la chos kyi sku la ni chos nyid kyi
T02D2534:203a-10: bdag nyid can dang chos rnams kyi bdag nyid can
T02D2534:203a-11: dang / ye shes kyi bdag nyid can gyi dbye ba gsum dang /
T02D2534:203a-12: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang /
T02D2534:203a-13: sprul pa'i sku dang gnyis te /
T02D2534:203a-15: sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can //
T02D2534:203a-17: de la sku gsum ni so so rang gis rig pa ste /
T02D2534:203a-19: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni sa bcu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang thun mongs ngo //
T02D2534:203a-20: sprul pa'i sku ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
T02D2534:203a-21: la sogs pa thams cad dang thun mongs yin pas
T02D2534:203a-23: bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi sku dang /
T02D2534:203a-24: long spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang /
T02D2534:203a-25: sprul pa'i sku'i ngo bo rnams phye ste spros pa dang /
T02D2534:203a-26: 'og nas rang gi gnas skabs nyid du bstan pas na 'dir ma spros so //
T02D2534:203a-27: khyab bdag ye shes lnga yi bdag / ces bya
T02D2534:203a-28: ba la bcom ldan 'das de nyid ldog pa'i dbye
T02D2534:203a-29: ba dang / mdzad pa'i dbye bas 'di ltar rnam par bzhugs te /
T02D2534:203a-34: chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba ni ye shes lnga rnams so //
T02D2534:203a-35: de la me long gi dkyil 'khor shin tu dri
T02D2534:203a-36: ma med pa la sogs pa'i kha dog dang nye
T02D2534:203a-37: ba'i phyogs na gnas pa'am nam mkha'i ngos na gnas
T02D2534:203a-38: pa'i skar ma'i tshogs la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan snang
T02D2534:203a-39: yang me long ni 'di snyam du 'di ni sngon
T02D2534:203a-42: 'di ni thag nye ba'o snyam du mi sems kyang de'i gnas pa rnams sngon po dang /
T02D2534:203a-44: ring ba la sogs pa rnam par rtog cing 'jog par byed do //
T02D2534:203a-45: de bzhin du nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib
T02D2534:203a-46: pa rnams dang bral bas dri ma med cing rnam
T02D2534:203a-48: shes bya thams cad la khyab pa'i ye shes kyi
T02D2534:203a-49: me long la ni 'di dag thams cad nye bar
T02D2534:203a-50: gyur cing thams cad so sor snang la /
T02D2534:203a-51: gdul bya'i tshogs rnams kyi bsod nams dang rjes su
T02D2534:203b-0: mthun pa'i gzugs brnyan @203b 'char zhing snang ba'i rgyur
T02D2534:203b-1: 'gyur bas na me long lta bu'i ye shes zhes
T02D2534:203b-2: bya'o // de yang chos kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis
T02D2534:203b-3: thams cad mnyam pas na mnyam pa nyid kyi ye
T02D2534:203b-4: bya'o // shes zhes bya'o // de nyid ni rten
T02D2534:203b-5: cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i ngo bo nyid rtog pa'i
T02D2534:203b-6: so so rang gi rig pas so sor rtogs pas
T02D2534:203b-7: na so sor rtog pa'i ye shes zhes bya'o //
T02D2534:203b-8: de lta yin du zin kyang 'gro ba ma lus
T02D2534:203b-9: pa'i mngon par 'dod pa'i don byed pa'i khyad par
T02D2534:203b-10: can gyi bya ba sgrub par mdzad de /
T02D2534:203b-11: so sor snang bar bskyed pas na bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes zhes bya'o //
T02D2534:203b-12: de ltar gdul bya rnams nya bar 'jog par mdzad du zin kyang /
T02D2534:203b-13: de shin tu yang rang bzhin gyis dri ma med pa'i phyir /
T02D2534:203b-14: chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye shes zhes bya ste /
T02D2534:203b-15: de ltar gcig pa yin yang rnam par rtog pa'i dbye ba byas pa yin gyi /
T02D2534:203b-16: gzhan du na ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid gcig pu nyid du mi rigs so //
T02D2534:203b-17: gzhan dag ni gzhan du yang ston to //
T02D2534:203b-18: mi bskyod pa'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pas na me long lta bu'i ye shes te /
T02D2534:203b-19: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas kyang thams cad mngon sum du gyur te /
T02D2534:203b-20: ji ltar la las me long la gzugs brnyan du
T02D2534:203b-21: gyur pa'i ye shes bya rnams mthong ba de bzhin
T02D2534:203b-22: du rang gi ye shes kyi me long la shes
T02D2534:203b-23: bya snang ba rnams shes shing /
T02D2534:203b-24: gzhan rnams la yang ston pa yin te /
T02D2534:203b-25: de bas na me long dang chos mthun pas na me long lta bu'i ye shes zhes bya'o //
T02D2534:203b-26: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes te /
T02D2534:203b-27: ro gcig pa'i bde ba thams cad nyams su myong ba'i mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes zhes bya'o //
T02D2534:203b-28: 'od dpag tu med pa'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pas so sor rtog pa'i ye shes te /
T02D2534:203b-29: 'dod chags la sogs pas mgos pa'i ngo bo nyid la rnam par dpyod pa'i bdag nyid can no //
T02D2534:203b-30: don yod par grub pa'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pas bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes te /
T02D2534:203b-31: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyi nang gi mchod pa'i bya ba la 'jug par byed do //
T02D2534:203b-32: rnam par snang mdzad kyi bdag nyid can du gyur
T02D2534:203b-33: pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye
T02D2534:203b-34: shes te thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i
T02D2534:203b-35: bde ba chen po nyams su myong ba 'byung ba
T02D2534:203b-37: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos 'byung ba las
T02D2534:203b-38: skyes pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so
T02D2534:204a-1: kyang rnam par rtog pa dang bcas ba ste /
T02D2534:204a-2: gzhan du gsang sngags kyi tshul 'byung ba mi srid
T02D2534:204a-3: pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'di la cung zad
T02D2534:204a-4: cig dpyad par bya ba yod de /
T02D2534:204a-5: gal te ye shes de dag rgyun tha dad par
T02D2534:204a-6: gnas na ji ltar ye shes kyi bdag nyid can
T02D2534:204a-7: gcig pur 'gyur / yang na gcig pu la phan
T02D2534:204a-8: tshun rjes su zhugs pa yin na rgyun tha dad
T02D2534:204a-9: par ma gyur par gnas pa ni shin tu yang
T02D2534:204a-11: de lta mod kyi sngags kyi tshul la yang rnam
T02D2534:204a-12: par mi rtog pa'i phyogs nyid dang sbyar bar bya
T02D2534:204a-13: ba yin te / rnam rtog gti mug chen po ni //
T02D2534:204a-14: 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor byid ba nyid //
T02D2534:204a-15: mi rtog ting 'dzin la gnas na ;
T02D2534:204a-16: / mkha' bzhin dri ma med par snang //
T02D2534:204a-17: zhes gsungs pas rnam par mi rtog ba la ni
T02D2534:204a-18: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid
T02D2534:204a-19: mthar thug pa yod pa ma yin no //
T02D2534:204a-20: zhar la 'ongs pas chog gi dkyus ma nyid la 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2534:204a-21: sangs rgyas lnga pa dag cod pan can //
T02D2534:204a-23: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D2534:204a-27: don yod par grub pa ste /
T02D2534:204a-28: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga las bsgrubs
T02D2534:204a-29: pa'i cod pan ni sangs rgyas kyi rin po che
T02D2534:204a-30: dang ldan pa yin pas na sangs rgyas lnga bdag
T02D2534:204a-31: go // cod pan des dam pa'i dbang phyug gi
T02D2534:204a-32: bdag po nyid du dbang bskur bar gyur pa gang
T02D2534:204a-33: yin pa de ni sangs rgyas mnga' bdag cod pan
T02D2534:204a-34: go // no // yang na ye shes lnga'i bdag
T02D2534:204a-35: nyid can gyi sangs rgyas lnga'i ngo bo nyid du
T02D2534:204a-36: 'gyur bas rang nyid yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
T02D2534:204a-37: rgyas lnga'i cod pan gyi gzugs kyis thams cad la
T02D2534:204a-38: dbang bskur ba'i ngo bo nyid du zhugs pas na
T02D2534:204a-39: sangs rgyas mnga' bdag cod ban zhes bshad do //
T02D2534:204a-40: spyan lnga chags pa med pa 'chang /
T02D2534:204a-41: zhes bya ba la sha'i spyan dang /
T02D2534:204a-45: sangs rgyas kyi spyan zhes pa'i spyan lnga po chags pa med pa dang /
T02D2534:204a-46: thogs pa med pa'i nus pa dang ldan pa 'chang bar mdzad pas na /
T02D2534:204a-47: spyan lnga chags pa med pa 'chang //
T02D2534:204a-49: yang na ji skad du spyan lnga gang la yod
T02D2534:204a-50: pa de ni spyan lnga zhes bya ba la chags
T02D2534:204a-51: pa ni thogs pa ste 'khor ba dang mya ngan
T02D2534:204a-52: las 'das pa la mngon par zhen pa'o //
T02D2534:204b-0: de lta bu'i mngon par zhen pa med pas na @204b chags pa med pa'o //
T02D2534:204b-1: chags pa med pa de gnyis su med par 'dzin
T02D2534:204b-2: par mdzad pas na chags pa med pa 'chang zhes
T02D2534:204b-3: bya'o // sangs rgyas thams cad skyed pa po //
T02D2534:204b-4: sangs rgyas sras po dam pa'i mchog / ces bya
T02D2534:204b-5: ba la 'di ni rgyan dang 'gal bar bshad pas
T02D2534:204b-6: ngo bo nyid bshad pa yin te /
T02D2534:204b-7: ji ltar sangs rgyas thams cad skyed pa po yin
T02D2534:204b-8: zhe na gsang sngags kyi tshul la ni byang chub
T02D2534:204b-9: kyi sems / rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2534:204b-10: drug ste rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa skyed
T02D2534:204b-12: de yang mgon po 'jam pa'i dbyangs yin te de
T02D2534:204b-13: bas na sangs rgyas thams cad skyed pa'i yum yin
T02D2534:204b-14: no // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
T02D2534:204b-15: tshul ltar na ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T02D2534:204b-16: phyin pa las sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung bar 'dod
T02D2534:204b-17: la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
T02D2534:204b-18: rdo rje blo'o zhes gsungs pas na /
T02D2534:204b-19: sangs rgyas thams cad skyed pa'i yum yin no //
T02D2534:204b-20: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon
T02D2534:204b-21: nur gyur pas gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed
T02D2534:204b-22: kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu
T02D2534:204b-23: sems bskyed pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D2534:204b-24: pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa yang dag
T02D2534:204b-25: par 'dzin du bcug nas sangs rgyas kyi byang chub
T02D2534:204b-26: la rab tu gzhag pa yin pas na rnam pa
T02D2534:204b-27: gsum car gyis kyang sangs rgyas thams cad skyed pa
T02D2534:204b-29: gal te skyed pa po yin na ji ltar na
T02D2534:204b-30: sangs rgyas kyi sras su 'gyur ba yin zhe na
T02D2534:204b-31: / sangs rgyas sras po dam pa'i mchog / ces bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2534:204b-32: sangs rgyas kyi sras po mchog ni sangs rgyas rnams ni mthar phyin pa ste /
T02D2534:204b-33: byang chub sems dpa' gzugs kyi gnas skabs kyis bzhugs pa la dgyes so zhes bya ba'i don te /
T02D2534:204b-34: chos kyi mchog ni chos kyi mthar thug pa'i zhes bya ba bzhin no //
T02D2534:204b-35: glegs bam la la las ni //
T02D2534:204b-36: sangs rgyas sras po dam pa mchog / ces zer
T02D2534:204b-37: te de la rang gi don la rab kyi mthar
T02D2534:204b-38: thug par byon bas na dam pa'o //
T02D2534:204b-39: gzhan gyi don la rab kyi mthar thug par byon
T02D2534:204b-40: pas na mchog go zhes bya bar blta bar bya'o
T02D2534:204b-41: // shes pa srid 'byung skye gnas med //
T02D2534:204b-42: chos las 'byung ba srid pa sel //
T02D2534:204b-43: zhes bya ba la shes rab nyid srid pa yin pas na srid pa ste /
T02D2534:204b-44: 'di las sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams
T02D2534:204b-45: dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams 'byung bas
T02D2534:205a-1: rnams las byung ba'i nang nas mtho ba nyid du
T02D2534:205a-2: skyes pa gang la yod pa de ni shes pa
T02D2534:205a-4: skye gnas med ces bya ba ni skye gnas kyi rgyu dang skye gnas kyi lam la bya la /
T02D2534:205a-5: de dag med pa ste 'khor bar skye ba'i rgyu
T02D2534:205a-6: med pa gang yin pa de la ni skye gnas
T02D2534:205a-7: med ces bya'o // skye ba'i rgyu med na ji ltar byang chub sems dpar 'gyur //
T02D2534:205a-8: rgyu med pa las ni ci yang 'byung bar mi
T02D2534:205a-9: 'gyur ba rigs pas brtags na sems can nam sems
T02D2534:205a-10: can ma yin pa rnams ni rgyu las gzhan du
T02D2534:205a-11: ltos pa med par skyes bar mi rigs so zhes
T02D2534:205a-12: rtogs pa la chos las 'byung ba zhes bya ba
T02D2534:205a-13: gsungs te / chos rnams kyi skye gnas yin pas na chos las 'byung ba yin pa'am /
T02D2534:205a-14: 'di la chos kyi skye gnas mnga' bas na chos las 'byung ba ste /
T02D2534:205a-15: gang gi tshe chos rnams kyi skye gnas zhes drug
T02D2534:205a-16: pas mtshams sbyar ba de'i tshe ni chos kyi dbyings
T02D2534:205a-17: kyi ngo bo nyid du gyur pas chos rnams kyi
T02D2534:205a-18: rgyu ste / de'i rgyu gzhan med pas skye gnas med pa dang /
T02D2534:205a-19: chos la 'byung ba zhes 'gal ba med la /
T02D2534:205a-20: 'bru mang po pa'i phyogs ltar na yang 'khor ba'i
T02D2534:205a-21: rgyur gyur pa med pas skye gnas med pa yin
T02D2534:205a-22: gyi / shes rab dang thabs gnyis su med pa'i
T02D2534:205a-23: sbyin pa la sogs pa'i chos rnams las byung bas
T02D2534:205a-24: na chos las byung zhes bya ba la 'gal ba
T02D2534:205a-25: gyi / med de / de bzhin du shes pa
T02D2534:205a-26: srid 'byung zhes bya ba dang srid pa sel zhes
T02D2534:205a-27: bya ba yang de dang 'dra ste /
T02D2534:205a-28: ji skad du bstan pa'i don ma rtog pas 'gal bar khong du chud par 'gyur gyi /
T02D2534:205a-29: bdag gis ji ltar bshad pa de ltar ni 'gal ba 'ga' yang med do //
T02D2534:205a-30: de bas na 'di ltar rgyan dang 'gal ba'i bshad pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2534:205a-31: ji ltar na srid pa sel ba nyid yin zhe na /
T02D2534:205a-32: gcig bu sra mkhregs rdo rje'i bdag / ces gsungs te sra ba 'thas shing cha shas med pa'o //
T02D2534:205a-33: rtse mo dang bcas par gnas pas na rtser bcas te rtse mo dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2534:205a-34: de lta bu'i bye brag gis khyad par du byas pa gang yin zhe na /
T02D2534:205a-35: rdo rje'i bdag ces bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2534:205a-36: bdag ces bya ba'i sgra ni rang bzhin gyi rnam grangs so //
T02D2534:205a-37: de ni 'di skad du ston par 'gyur te /
T02D2534:205a-38: rdo rje'i bdag nyid can de ni ye shes lnga'i
T02D2534:205a-39: rang bzhin gyis rtse lnga yod pas na rtse bcas
T02D2534:205a-40: so // thogs pa med pa'i nus pa dang ldan pas na gcig bu'o //
T02D2534:205a-41: gzhan gyis skabs mi phyed pas na sra ba'o //
T02D2534:205b-0: rdo rje'i @205b gzugs kyis mi shes pa'i srid pa
T02D2534:205b-1: 'jig par byed pas srid pa sel zhes bshad do
T02D2534:205b-2: // yang na gcig pu gnyis su med pa sra
T02D2534:205b-3: ba'i mkhregs pa gang yin pa de ni gcig pu
T02D2534:205b-4: // sra mkhregs so // 'di'i don ni 'di yin te /
T02D2534:205b-5: gnyis su med cing mkhregs la khong stong lta bu'i
T02D2534:205b-6: gnyis su med pas na gcig pu ste gnyis su
T02D2534:205b-7: med pa de ni rang rig pa la ma gtogs
T02D2534:205b-8: pa rig par bya ba med pas na de nyid
T02D2534:205b-9: ni mkhregs pa ste gnyis pa ni tshad ma dang
T02D2534:205b-11: de bas na rdo rje dang 'dra bar mi shigs
T02D2534:205b-12: pa'i gzugs can du gyur pas rdo rje'i bdag ces
T02D2534:205b-13: bya ste / gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo nyid bcom ldan 'das rje bcun 'jam dpal lo //
T02D2534:205b-14: skyes ma thag pa 'gro ba'i bdag / ces bya
T02D2534:205b-15: ba la skyes ma thag pa ni h'um mdzad de
T02D2534:205b-16: / de'i skad cig nyid la rdo rje'i bdag nyid du skyes shing byung ba'o //
T02D2534:205b-17: 'gro ba'i bdag ces bya ba ni bka' bsgo ba
T02D2534:205b-18: nyan cing rang dbang du mdzad pas na 'gro ba'i
T02D2534:205b-19: bdag go // yang na dam pa yin zhing mdzes
T02D2534:205b-20: pa'i bdag por 'khrungs pa gang yin pa de ni
T02D2534:205b-21: 'jam pa'i dbyangs so zhes rjes su dpag par bya'o
T02D2534:205b-22: bdag go // // yang skyes ma thag pa ste
T02D2534:205b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su byung ba'i skad cig
T02D2534:205b-24: ma nyid la 'gro ba'i bdag por gyur pa ni
T02D2534:205b-25: byang chub kyi sems yin pas na rigs kyi khyad
T02D2534:205b-26: par gyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i sras dam pa dang
T02D2534:205b-27: bdag go // // mtshungs so // de ni nam
T02D2534:205b-28: mkha' dang mnyam par chos thams cad thugs su chud
T02D2534:205b-29: pa las yang dag par 'khrungs pa yin pas na
T02D2534:205b-31: gdul bya'i dbang gis de dang de'i gzugs su rang nyid du gyur pas na rnag bung ba'o //
T02D2534:205b-32: de lta na ni gdul bya'i dbang gis 'gro ba
T02D2534:205b-33: thams cad du song ba der gtogs pa'i nyes pa'i
T02D2534:205b-34: skyon dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes rtog pa bsal
T02D2534:205b-35: ba'i phyir / shes rab ye shes me bo che //
T02D2534:205b-36: zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2534:205b-38: nyon mongs pa'i bud shing ma lus par sreg pa'i
T02D2534:205b-39: nus pa dang ldan pa'i shes rab ye shes kyi
T02D2534:205b-40: me'i gzugs can bcom ldan 'das la ni 'gro ba
T02D2534:205b-41: thams cad du gtogs pa'i nyes pa rnams kyi skabs
T02D2534:205b-42: med pa'i phyir shes rab ye shes te /
T02D2534:205b-43: chos thams cad dngos po med pa nyid du thugs su chud pa'o //
T02D2534:205b-44: de nyid kyis ni nye bar dmigs pa'i nyon mongs
T02D2534:205b-45: pa'i shing rnams thal bar byed pas na me bo
T02D2534:206a-1: 'das pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid do //
T02D2534:206a-2: de bas na de nyid gdul bya sna tshogs pa'i
T02D2534:206a-3: rgyud la rnam pa tha dad pa'i tshul gyis snang
T02D2534:206a-4: zhing gsal bar byed pas na rnam par snad bar
T02D2534:206a-5: byed pa'o // zhing mtha' yas pa snang bar byed
T02D2534:206a-6: cing thams cad du chos nyid gsal bar byed pas
T02D2534:206a-8: nyi ma la sogs pa'i 'od ltar bems po ma
T02D2534:206a-9: yin par khyad par du bya ba bstan par bya
T02D2534:206a-10: ba'i phyir ye shes snang ba zhes bya ba gsungs
T02D2534:206a-11: te / ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi snang ba
T02D2534:206a-12: des rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i tshul gyis snang bar
T02D2534:206a-13: mdzad pas na lam me ba'o //
T02D2534:206a-14: de ltar rnam par snang bar mdzad pa ni nyi
T02D2534:206a-15: ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar so sor nges par 'jig rten
T02D2534:206a-16: gyi khams su snang bar mdzad dam /
T02D2534:206a-17: 'on te de nyid gcig pu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang bar mdzad ce na /
T02D2534:206a-18: de ni gcig pu nyid kyis snang bar mdzad pa
T02D2534:206a-19: bstan pa'i phyir 'gro ba'i mar me zhes bya ba
T02D2534:206a-20: gsungs te / mar me ni sgrib pa dang bcas pa dang /
T02D2534:206a-21: thogs pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs nges pa na gnas
T02D2534:206a-22: pa nyid du 'byung bar gyur pa yi na la
T02D2534:206a-23: / ye shes kyi mar me bcom ldan 'das ni
T02D2534:206a-24: nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad
T02D2534:206a-25: dang thogs pa dang bcas pa'i phyi'i don mi mnga'
T02D2534:206a-26: bas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gdul bya'i
T02D2534:206a-27: rgyud thams cad kyi mi shes pa'i mun pa cig
T02D2534:206a-28: car sel bar mdzad pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba
T02D2534:206a-29: shar nas 'gro ba'i mar mer gyur pa la nyams
T02D2534:206a-31: sgron ma dang 'dra ba'i ye shes kyis snang bas
T02D2534:206a-32: 'jig rten thams cad snang bar mdzad cing nam mkha'
T02D2534:206a-33: la bzhud par ston pa ni ye shes sgron ma
T02D2534:206a-34: ste / ye shes kyi sgron ma gang yin pa de ni ye shes sgron ma'o //
T02D2534:206a-35: thams cad du 'gro ba'i nus pas phul du byung
T02D2534:206a-36: ba'i mtshan nyid kyis che ba'i gzi brjid gang yin
T02D2534:206a-37: pa de ni gzi brjid chen po'o //
T02D2534:206a-38: shin tu gsal bar snang bar gyur ba'i ngag tshul can yin pas na 'od gsal ba'o //
T02D2534:206a-39: gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba la sogs pa'i sngags
T02D2534:206a-40: kyi lha rnams kyi bdag nyid can du gyur pa'i
T02D2534:206a-41: bye brag bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2534:206a-42: sngags drag sngags bdag rig sngags rgyal //
T02D2534:206a-43: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2534:206a-44: khro bo'i gsang sngags kyi bdag por gyur bas na sngags drag sngags bdag go //
T02D2534:206a-45: rig sngags kyi rgyal po gnod mdzes te /
T02D2534:206a-46: h'um bzhi'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2534:206b-0: gsang sngags rgyal po ni yi @206b ge bhr'um ste /
T02D2534:206b-1: gsang sngags thams cad kyi bdag por gyur pa'i phyir te /
T02D2534:206b-2: de'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pas na gsang sngags rgyal po'o //
T02D2534:206b-3: gtsug tor kun nas snang ba'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pas na don chen byed do //
T02D2534:206b-4: gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i yi ge gcig pa'i
T02D2534:206b-5: ngo bo nyid du gyur pas gtsug tor chen po'o
T02D2534:206b-6: // 'khor los sgyur ba'i nyon mongs pa sel ba'i
T02D2534:206b-7: ngo bo nyid du gyur pas na rmad byung gtsug
T02D2534:206b-8: // go // gtsug tor gyen du 'phags kyi ngo
T02D2534:206b-9: bo nyid du gyur pas na nam mkha'i bdag po'o
T02D2534:206b-10: // go // // gzi brjid phung po'i ngo bo nyid du gnas pas na sna tshogs ston to //
T02D2534:206b-11: gsang sngags kyi mdzod kyi gtsug tor thams cad kyi
T02D2534:206b-12: bdag nyid du gyur pas na sangs rgyas kun bdag
T02D2534:206b-14: yang na khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi gsang sngags kyi
T02D2534:206b-15: bdag por gyur pas na sngags drag sngags bdag go
T02D2534:206b-16: // rig pa ni spyan la sogs pa yin te //
T02D2534:206b-17: de rnams kyi dbus su rgyal por gyur pas na
T02D2534:206b-18: rig sngags rgyal te gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi bdag
T02D2534:206b-19: po mdzad ces bya ba'i don to ;
T02D2534:206b-20: / gsang sngags kyi bdag po nyid du gyur pa'i
T02D2534:206b-21: chos kyi dkyil 'khor du gsang sngags thams cad kyi
T02D2534:206b-22: bdag por gyur pas na gsang sngags rgyal po'o //
T02D2534:206b-23: de ltar rnam pa thams cad kyis sems can thams
T02D2534:206b-24: cad kyi don ma lus par mdzad pas na don
T02D2534:206b-26: gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba bcu gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gsang sngags kyi lha rnams dang /
T02D2534:206b-27: ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par rmad du byung pa
T02D2534:206b-28: la sogs pa'i tshul gyis zhugs pas na gtsug tor
T02D2534:206b-29: chen po rmad byung gtsug go //
T02D2534:206b-30: nam mkha'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi bdag bor gyur bas na nam mkha'i bdag po'o //
T02D2534:206b-31: sna tshogs pa la lta ba'i dang tshul gang la
T02D2534:206b-32: yod pa de la de skad ces bya ste 'gro
T02D2534:206b-33: ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi gzugs
T02D2534:206b-34: kyis 'gro ba rnams 'dul bar 'dul bar mdzad pas
T02D2534:206b-35: na sna tshogs ston zhes bya'o //
T02D2534:206b-36: rnam par snang mdzad chen po la sogs pa de
T02D2534:206b-37: bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyag rgya
T02D2534:206b-38: chen po la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid du gyur
T02D2534:206b-39: pas na / sangs rgyas kun bdag dngos po mchog / ces bya'o //
T02D2534:206b-40: de la mnyam par lta bas 'gro ba rnams la
T02D2534:206b-41: gzigs pas kun du dga' bar byed pa'i spyan gang
T02D2534:206b-43: 'gro kun dga' ba'i mig dang ldan //
T02D2534:206b-45: sems can thams cad gdul par bya ba'i phyir gzugs
T02D2534:206b-46: thams cad du sprul pa sna tshogs shing tha dad
T02D2534:207a-1: na sna tshogs gzugs can no //
T02D2534:207a-2: mtho ris dang thar pa nye bar ston pa'i 'byin pa bo yin pas na skyed pa po'o //
T02D2534:207a-3: dang zhes bya ba ni sdud pa ste sna tshogs
T02D2534:207a-4: pa'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba dang dge ba'i las kyi
T02D2534:207a-6: bcom ldan 'das de nyid tshangs pa dang /
T02D2534:207a-8: dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa rnams kyis me
T02D2534:207a-9: tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i rnam pa thams cad
T02D2534:207a-10: kyis mchod par 'os pa yin pas na mchod pa'o
T02D2534:207a-11: // mchod yon dang zhabs bsil dang gdan la sogs
T02D2534:207a-12: pa phul bas rjed par 'os pa yin pas na
T02D2534:207a-13: // rjed pa'o // chos rnams mngon du byed pas
T02D2534:207a-14: na dad srong ngo zhes bshad pa'i phyir te de
T02D2534:207a-15: kho na nyid gzigs pas drang srong ngo //
T02D2534:207a-16: 'jig rten pa'i lam la yang cung zad tsam gyi
T02D2534:207a-17: snang ba thob par gyur pa'i 'jig rten pa'i drang
T02D2534:207a-18: srong rnams dang 'jig rten las 'das pa yang nyan
T02D2534:207a-19: thos dgra bcom pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D2534:207a-20: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i drang srong de rnams kyi nang na ches mchog yin zhing /
T02D2534:207a-21: de khon nyid ma lus pa rnam par thams cad
T02D2534:207a-22: du mngon sum du mdzad pas na drang srong chen
T02D2534:207a-23: po'o // de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
T02D2534:207a-25: padma ste rigs gsum gyi ngo bo nyid du gyur
T02D2534:207a-26: pa'i bdag nyid 'dzin par mdzad pas na rigs gsum
T02D2534:207a-27: 'chad pa'o // rigs gsum gyi nang du gtogs pa'i
T02D2534:207a-28: rigs thams cad kyi gsang sngags rnams 'dzin pas na
T02D2534:207a-30: 'di la gsang sngags mnga' bas na gsang sngags can zhes bya'o //
T02D2534:207a-31: grub pa'i mtha' thams cad kyi gsang sngags rab tu
T02D2534:207a-32: ston pa'i gtso bor gyur pa nyid kyis 'chang par
T02D2534:207a-33: mdzad pas na / dam tshig chen po gsang sngags 'dzin //
T02D2534:207a-35: mchog tu gyur pas na gtso bo'o //
T02D2534:207a-36: sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun gsum skyong bar
T02D2534:207a-37: mdzad cing rgyun mi 'chad par 'jug par mdzad pas
T02D2534:207a-39: theg pa mchog gsum ston pa po //
T02D2534:207a-40: zhes bya ba la nges par 'byin par byed pa'i
T02D2534:207a-41: theg pa ni rnam pa gsum ste gsum gang zhe
T02D2534:207a-42: na ; nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /
T02D2534:207a-43: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang theg pa chen po'o //
T02D2534:207a-44: de la nyan thos kyi theg pa gang zhe na
T02D2534:207a-45: sangs rgyas 'byung ba med par nyan thos kyi theg
T02D2534:207a-48: nyan thos rnams kyi yang dag par lta ba ni pha rol gyi sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba'o //
T02D2534:207b-0: de la nyan thos na gang 'di @207b tshul khrims
T02D2534:207b-1: sdom pa ste bslab pa ji ltar bcas pa bzhin
T02D2534:207b-2: du rjes su 'jug pas na tshul khrims kyi phung
T02D2534:207b-3: po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur la /
T02D2534:207b-4: tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su rdzogs nas ting
T02D2534:207b-5: nge 'dzin gyi phung po yongs su rdzogs par byed
T02D2534:207b-6: la / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po yongs su
T02D2534:207b-7: rdzogs nas shes rab kyi phung po yongs su rdzogs
T02D2534:207b-8: la / par byed la / shes rab kyi phung
T02D2534:207b-9: po yongs su rdzogs nas rnam par grol ba'i phung
T02D2534:207b-10: po yongs su rdzogs par byed la /
T02D2534:207b-11: rnam par grol ba'i phung po yongs su rdzogs nas
T02D2534:207b-12: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po
T02D2534:207b-13: yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ste /
T02D2534:207b-14: gang 'di la mkhas pa 'di ni nyan thos kyi theg pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2534:207b-15: gzhan yang nyan thos kyi theg pa ni gang bsod nams dang /
T02D2534:207b-16: bsod nams ma yin ba dang /
T02D2534:207b-17: mi g-yo ba'i 'du byed rnams la rnam par smod pa dang /
T02D2534:207b-18: khams gsum ba thams cad la yid byung zhing 'dod chags dang bral ba dang /
T02D2534:207b-19: 'du byed thams cad la mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal bar rtog pa dang /
T02D2534:207b-20: chos thams cad la bdag med par rtog pa dang /
T02D2534:207b-21: mya ngan las 'das pa zhi ba la mngon par dga' ba dang /
T02D2534:207b-22: skad cig kyang srid par skye bar mi 'dod pa dang /
T02D2534:207b-23: rtag tu 'jigs par lta ba dang /
T02D2534:207b-24: rtag tu yid mi ston pa dang /
T02D2534:207b-25: phung po rnams la gsod par 'du shes pa dang /
T02D2534:207b-26: khams rnams la sbrul gdug pa lta bur rtog ba'i 'du shes dang /
T02D2534:207b-27: skye mched rnams la grong stong pa lta bur 'du shes pa dang /
T02D2534:207b-28: skye ba'i gnas thams cad la smon pa med pa'i 'du shes dang /
T02D2534:207b-29: mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas dang skyabs su 'du shes pa dang /
T02D2534:207b-31: rab tu ston pa 'di ni nyan thos kyi theg pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2534:207b-32: de la rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa gang zhe na /
T02D2534:207b-34: rkyen gang dag gis rang sangs rgyas rnams nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rnam pa de dag dang /
T02D2534:207b-35: rkyen de dag byang chub sems dpas yang dag pa
T02D2534:207b-36: ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa de
T02D2534:207b-37: dag gang zhe na 'dun pa dang /
T02D2534:207b-39: bag yod pa chen pos nyan thos kyi lta bu
T02D2534:207b-40: ma yin pa'i spyin pa'i bsod nams kyi chogs sog
T02D2534:207b-41: pa dang / tshul khrims kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs sog pa dang /
T02D2534:207b-42: thos pa nyung ba la chos kyi nan tan byed pa dang /
T02D2534:208a-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur @208a * //
T02D2534:208a-1: byed pa la yang zhum pa med pa dang /
T02D2534:208a-3: rtag tu rab tu 'byung ba la gzhol ba dang /
T02D2534:208a-6: 'du 'dzi la mi dga' zhing dben ba la dga' ba dang /
T02D2534:208a-7: rab tu dpen par gnas ma la 'cha' ba dang //
T02D2534:208a-10: sbyin pa'i gnas kyi sa la mngon par dga' ba dang /
T02D2534:208a-11: rgyun mi 'chad par rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la lta ba dang /
T02D2534:208a-12: nges par 'byung ba'i dbyings gcig la rtog pa dang /
T02D2534:208a-13: rang byung gi ye shes kyi rab tu brgal bar bya ba dang /
T02D2534:208a-14: dmigs pa la 'jug pa thob pa dang /
T02D2534:208a-18: snyoms par 'jug pa rgyun pi 'chad pa dang /
T02D2534:208a-19: gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa'i ye shes bskyed pa dang /
T02D2534:208a-20: dmigs pa gang yang rung ba la rkyen gyis ye shes rtogs pa ste /
T02D2534:208a-23: rab tu ston pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o //
T02D2534:208a-24: de la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po gang zhe na /
T02D2534:208a-25: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po ni dpag tu med de /
T02D2534:208a-26: de las phyogs tsam zhig bstan to //
T02D2534:208a-27: theg pa chen po de sems can thams cad kyi go skabs 'byed pas na dpag tu med pa'o //
T02D2534:208a-28: theg pa de ni chags pa med pa'i ye shes la btang pa ste sgrib pa med pa'o //
T02D2534:208a-29: theg pa de ni sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba ste /
T02D2534:208a-30: bsod nams kyi tshogs dang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsags pa'o //
T02D2534:208a-31: theg pa de ni sems can thams cad kyi sems
T02D2534:208a-32: kyi spyod pa la las su rung ba'i phyir pha
T02D2534:208a-33: rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su sbyong ba
T02D2534:208a-34: byas pa'o // theg pa de ni thogs pa med
T02D2534:208a-35: par byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bas na thams
T02D2534:208a-36: cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshogs nyams su len
T02D2534:208a-37: byas pa'o // par byed pa'o // theg pa de
T02D2534:208a-38: ni sems can thams cad la sbyin pa'i gnas kyi
T02D2534:208a-39: phyir sems can thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i
T02D2534:208a-41: theg pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
T02D2534:208a-42: mngon sum du gyur pa'i phyir las ngan pa'i 'jigs
T02D2534:208a-44: theg pa de ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
T02D2534:208a-45: thams cad dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rgyal
T02D2534:208a-46: mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba ste /
T02D2534:208b-0: bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba dang ngan pa'i tshogs @208b thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'o //
T02D2534:208b-1: theg pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pa sgrib
T02D2534:208b-2: pa med par gyur pa ste mtha' dang mtha' med
T02D2534:208b-7: lta bar 'gyur ba thams cad dang /
T02D2534:208b-13: / theg pa de ni lhag pa'i bsam pa dang
T02D2534:208b-14: snying rje chen pos phye bas na chos thams cad
T02D2534:208b-15: phun sum tshogs pa'i rin po che thams cad dang
T02D2534:208b-16: ldan ba dang phun sum tshogs pa thams cad rnyed
T02D2534:208b-17: pa mi slu ba'i lam du 'gro ba sems can
T02D2534:208b-19: theg pa de ni thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med pa ste stobs bcu dang /
T02D2534:208b-21: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang /
T02D2534:208b-25: sems kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste /
T02D2534:208b-26: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po
T02D2534:208b-27: la mkhas pa zhes bya ste nges bar 'byin par

T02D2534:208b-29: dang de lhag par mos pa rnams la de bzhin

T02D2534:215a-0: tu phyin pa ni rigs mthun par ma 'dres @215a
T02D2534:215a-1: * // pa nyid du 'bras bu tshe ring bar gsungs pa yin gyi /
