T02D2534:215a-14: bya ba ni log par btags pa tsam yin no
T02D2534:215a-15: // // gal te de bzhin gshegs pa gdul bar
T02D2534:215a-16: bya ba'i sems can rnams med pas mya ngan las

T02D2534:215a-23: gdul ba'i skye bo rnams srid pas de'i gzugs su

T02D2534:215a-29: mdzad de / / brgya byin la sogs pa'i gzugs
T02D2534:215a-30: kyis 'dul bar 'gyur ba med pa'i gtan tshigs kyang
T02D2534:215a-31: mdzad de / / med pa dang / brgya byin

T02D2534:215a-44: zhes bya ba 'di ni gang nas kyang ma gsungs

T02D2534:215b-1: phyir yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi mdzad
T02D2534:215b-2: de yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes 'dod na

T02D2534:215b-5: rgyas kyi sku bstan pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams
T02D2534:215b-6: la mya ngan las 'das pa nye bar bstan pas

T02D2534:215b-12: dus 'di ni ji skad du bstan pa /
T02D2534:215b-13: sangs rgyas mya ngan yong mi 'da' //
T02D2534:215b-14: chos kyang nub par mi 'gyur te //

T02D2534:215b-16: mya ngan 'da' bar ston par mdzad //

T02D2534:216a-0: de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la thogs pa med pa'i @216a * //

T02D2534:230a-36: ston gyi ngo bo nyid du gyur pa'i phyir dang
T02D2534:230a-37: / dga' ston chen po'i rgyur gyur ba'i phyir dga' ston chen po'o ;
T02D2534:230a-38: / thams cad du rgyun mi 'chad pa'i bde ba
T02D2534:230a-39: chen po'i do bo nyid du gyur pa'i byir dang
T02D2534:230a-40: / sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyur gyur pas na dga' chen no //
T02D2534:230a-41: sangs rgyas nyid du gyur pa la dga' zhing chags pa'am /
T02D2534:230b-0: sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa'i chags pa @230b chen po gang yin pa 'am /
T02D2534:230b-1: dga' ba thams cad kyi rgyur gyur pa rgyun du
T02D2534:230b-2: 'gro ba'i chos nyid la dga' ba'i ngo bo nyid
T02D2534:230b-3: yin pas na rol mo chen po ste zhes bya'o
T02D2534:230b-4: // bsnyen bskur sngon du 'gro ba'i mchod pa la
T02D2534:230b-5: sogs pa'i bye brag la ni bkur sti'i sgrar brjod
T02D2534:230b-6: // do // 'jig rten du bzang zhing mdzes par byas pas na rim gro ste /
T02D2534:230b-7: dam pa yin zhing mdzes pa chos kyi sku dang
T02D2534:230b-8: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rdzogs par byed pa gang
T02D2534:230b-9: yin pa de ni rim gro yin pa'am /
T02D2534:230b-10: bkur sti thams cad kyi rgyur gyur pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2534:230b-11: mdzes shing dam pa'i bya ba mdzad pa ste /
T02D2534:230b-12: sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
T02D2534:230b-13: la rab tu gzhan pa'i phyir smon lam btab pa
T02D2534:230b-14: dang / rjes su mthun par bdag dang gzhan gyi
T02D2534:230b-15: don rdzogs par mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni
T02D2534:230b-16: dang / rim gro ste / dam par mdzad pa'o //
T02D2534:230b-17: phun sum tshogs pa ni 'byor ba'i rgyur gyur pa
T02D2534:230b-18: bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi bdag nyid can du gyur
T02D2534:230b-19: pa'i phyir ram / phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2534:230b-20: ngan 'gro dang skye ba dang nyon mongs pa'i sdug
T02D2534:230b-21: bsngal bsal bas rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i
T02D2534:230b-22: sa rnams su 'jug pa'i dga' ba skyed pa dang
T02D2534:230b-23: / rang nyid kyang bde ba dang yid bde ba
T02D2534:230b-24: thams cad kyi bdag nyid can du gyur pas na
T02D2534:230b-26: rnam pa thams cad du yongs su dag pa'i rang
T02D2534:230b-27: bzhin can gyi sku mnga' bas na grags bdag go
T02D2534:230b-28: // bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi bdag nyid can yin pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2534:230b-29: de'i rgyur gyur pa yin pa'i phyir dpal lo //
T02D2534:230b-31: mchog tu'o shing gang la ji ltar rigs pa'i mchog
T02D2534:230b-32: sngags rgyas nyid du 'os pa dang ldan pas na
T02D2534:230b-33: mchog ldan no // skal ba dang ldan pa'i sems
T02D2534:230b-34: can rnams la mchog tu gyur pa'i sangs rgyas nyid
T02D2534:230b-35: stsol bar mdzad par 'os pa yin pas na mchog
T02D2534:230b-36: mchog ldan no // sbyin no // 'di nyid kyi
T02D2534:230b-37: 'brel pa ni mchog sbyin gtso ste zhes bya ba
T02D2534:230b-38: mchog ldan no // sbyin no // yin no /
T02D2534:230b-39: mngon par 'dod cing khan mtho ba med pa'i mchog
T02D2534:230b-40: rgya chen po rab tu stsol bas na mchog sbyin
T02D2534:230b-41: mchog ldan no // sbyin no // yin no / gtso bo'o // skyabs 'dod pa rnams dang /
T02D2534:230b-42: dpung gnyen 'dod pa rnams la thams cad kyi skyabs
T02D2534:230b-43: su gyur pa'i don gyis na skyabs kyi dam pa'o
T02D2534:230b-44: // gzhan yang skyabs kyi 'os su 'dod pa dbang
T02D2534:230b-45: phyug chen po la sogs pa'ang rje btsun 'jam dpal
T02D2534:231a-2: de bas na de nyid ni skyabs kyi dam pa dang skyabs su 'os pa yin no //
T02D2534:231a-3: 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad kyis skrag pa rnams kyi skyabs su 'os pa yin pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2534:231a-4: 'jigs pa dang bcas pa las 'das pa'i mya ngan
T02D2534:231a-5: las 'das pa la rab tu 'jog pas na skyabs
T02D2534:231a-6: su 'os pa'o // 'khor ba'i rgyur gyur pa'i ma
T02D2534:231a-7: rig pa la sogs pa ni 'jigs pa'i rgyu yin
T02D2534:231a-9: de rnams kyi sgra ni nyan thos dang rang sangs
T02D2534:231a-10: rgyas la sogs pa dag kyang yin mod kyi de
T02D2534:231a-11: rnams ni mchog ma yin te /
T02D2534:231a-12: gang zag la bdag med par rtogs pas nyon mongs
T02D2534:231a-13: pa'i sgrib pa tsam spangs pa yin pa'i phyir ro
T02D2534:231a-14: // bdag dang bdag gir mngon par zhen pa'i rtsa ba nyon mongs pa dang /
T02D2534:231a-15: shes bya'i sgrib pa mi mnga' zhin bdag dang gzhan
T02D2534:231a-16: gyi rgyud la gnas pa'i 'jigs pa chen po rnams
T02D2534:231a-17: kyi dgra'i rab mtshog tu gyur cing 'jigs par mdzad
T02D2534:231a-18: pas nye bar dmigs pa'i rtsa bar gyur pa'i 'jigs
T02D2534:231a-19: pa thams cad la nye bar dmigs pa thams cad
T02D2534:231a-20: drungs nas 'byin pas stong pa nyid kyi ting nge
T02D2534:231a-21: 'dzin gyi ngo bo nyid la ni /
T02D2534:231a-22: 'jigs chen dgra ste rab kyi mchog /'jigs pa ma lus sel ba po //
T02D2534:231a-25: // / de ni mu stegs rnams kyis yongs su brtags
T02D2534:231a-26: pa'i brtul zhugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams 'dul
T02D2534:231a-27: ba'i phyir 'da' brtul zhugs ston pha po'i mtshan la
T02D2534:231a-28: sogs pa'i don bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2534:231a-29: gtsug phud phud pu zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
T02D2534:231a-30: phar zhing zag med sa bon bral //
T02D2534:231a-31: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis tshigs su bcad pa lnga gsungs pa yin te /
T02D2534:231a-32: de la skra dang kha spu bregs nas gtsug phud
T02D2534:231a-33: tsam 'jog cing 'di la gtsug phud tsam gyi mtshan
T02D2534:231a-36: dbyig pa gsum pa can gyi kun tu rgyu ba'i gzugs 'dzin pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T02D2534:231a-37: phud pu yod pa'i phyir phud pu can yin te /
T02D2534:231a-38: mgo bo'i dbus kyi skra bregs nas dpral ba'i mtha' skra 'jog bas na /
T02D2534:231a-39: phud bu can zhes bya'o zhes la la dag 'dod do //
T02D2534:231a-40: gzhan dag ni mngal nas skyes pa dang /
T02D2534:231a-43: rgyab kyi phyogs cha ste gsum du phung pu gsum
T02D2534:231a-44: 'jog pas na phung pu can zhes bya'o zhes zer
T02D2534:231b-0: kha cig na re gtsug phud can @231b zhes bya
T02D2534:231b-1: ba rma bya la zhon pas tsug phud can te
T02D2534:231b-2: / gzhon nu gdong drug pa la bya'o zhes zer
T02D2534:231b-3: bas de'i gzugs dang cha lugs 'dzin par mdzad pas
T02D2534:231b-5: shing shun dang ral pa 'chang zhing lha chen po
T02D2534:231b-6: la dad pa'i drang srong gi gzugs 'dzin par mdzad
T02D2534:231b-7: pas na lcang lo can no //
T02D2534:231b-8: skra'i rtsa ba la sogs pa thams cad sboms pa'i
T02D2534:231b-9: ral pa bsdus pa yod pas na ral pa ste
T02D2534:231b-10: / thams cad du yang gang dang gang gis 'dul
T02D2534:231b-11: ba'i sems can rnams 'dul bar bya ba'i phyir de
T02D2534:231b-12: dang de'i gzugs 'dzin par mdzad pa yin no zhes
T02D2534:231b-14: ska rags 'ching ba yongs su ma btang bar tshangs par spyod pa bsrungs pas na mun dza'o //
T02D2534:231b-15: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan dang rtse
T02D2534:231b-16: bran 'chang ba'i lha'i bu'i brtul zhugs 'dzin pa'i gzugs
T02D2534:231b-17: mdzad pas na cod pan thogs pa'o //
T02D2534:231b-18: gdong lnga zhes bya ba ni seng ge la bya bar bshad la /
T02D2534:231b-19: de'i brtul zhugs 'dzin pa'i gzugs 'chang bar mdzad pas na gdong lnga pa'o ;
T02D2534:231b-20: / yang na lha chen po'i mtshon cha 'chang ba ni gdong lnga pa zhes bya ste /
T02D2534:231b-21: de'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams 'dul par
T02D2534:231b-22: bya ba'i phyir de'i gzugs 'dzin par mdzad pas na
T02D2534:231b-23: gdong lnga pa'o // don dam par gdong lnga ni sgo lnga ste /
T02D2534:231b-27: mngon par 'dus ma byas pa dang /
T02D2534:231b-28: rang bzhin gyi 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni gdong lnga'o //
T02D2534:231b-29: phyogs bzhir gtsug phud bzhi dang /
T02D2534:231b-31: gtsug phud lnga pa'i gzhon nu'i brtul zhugs 'dzin cing
T02D2534:231b-32: byis pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa de'i gzugs 'dzin par
T02D2534:231b-33: mdzad pas na gtsug phud lnga'o //
T02D2534:231b-34: yang na dir za'i rgyal po gtsug phud lnga pas
T02D2534:231b-35: 'dul pa rnams de'i gzugs 'dzin par mdzad pas na
T02D2534:231b-36: gtsug phud lnga'o // don dam par gtsug phud lnga ni me long lta bu dang /
T02D2534:231b-40: chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid de /
T02D2534:231b-41: spyi gtsug bzhin du gnas pa gang yin pa de ni gtsug phud lnga dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2534:231b-42: zur phud lnga pa'i med tog gi thod kyi cod
T02D2534:231b-43: pan gang la yod pa de ni zur phud lnga
T02D2534:231b-45: gtsug phung la sogs pa bor zhing nge par spangs
T02D2534:231b-46: te ngang pa mchog gi mya ngan las 'das pa'i
T02D2534:232a-1: ba ni mgo zlum yin pa'am /
T02D2534:232a-2: 'di la mgo begs [?] pa tsam gyis kun du rgyu ba'i rtags yod pas na mgo zlum mo //
T02D2534:232a-3: yul dang dus dang rigs nges pa'i brtul zhugs kyi nges pa dang ldan pa ste /
T02D2534:232a-4: yul ni 'jug dgos dag tu srog chags gsang par mi bya'o //
T02D2534:232a-5: zhes bya ba dang dus ni tshes brgyad dam bcu bzhi 'am bco lnga dag go //
T02D2534:232a-6: rigs ni ri dgas sam bram ze rnams mi bsad do zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2534:232a-7: de lta bu la sogs pa'i mi dge ba bcu'i
T02D2534:232a-8: las kyi lam las bzlog pa phyogs chad pa med
T02D2534:232a-10: dus thams cad du srog chags thams cad gsod pa
T02D2534:232a-11: la sogs pa las ldog ba ni brtul zhugs chen
T02D2534:232a-12: po ste / de 'dzin par mdzad pas na /
T02D2534:232a-13: brtul zhugs chen po 'chang zhes bya'o //
T02D2534:232a-14: zhi ba'i grub pa'i mtha' las bshad pa'i brtul zhus
T02D2534:232a-15: chen pos 'dul ba rnams dga' bar bya ba'i phyir
T02D2534:232a-16: de'i brtul zhugs 'dzin par mdzad pas na btul zhugs
T02D2534:232a-18: yang na sems can ma lus pa 'don par byed
T02D2534:232a-19: pa la thun mong ma yin pa'i thugs rje chen
T02D2534:232a-20: po'i brtul zhugs 'dzin par mdzad pas na brtul zhugs
T02D2534:232a-22: yang na rig byed re re zhing lo bcu gnyis
T02D2534:232a-23: tshangs par spyod pa spyan nas khyim la gnas par
T02D2534:232a-24: mi byed pa nyid du slong mo spyod pa dang
T02D2534:232a-25: / nags na gnas pas gang tshe zad par byed pa de ni brtul zhugs chen po'o //
T02D2534:232a-26: bud med bsten pa las ldog pas na tshangs par spyod pa'o //
T02D2534:232a-27: yang na tshangs pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
T02D2534:232a-28: de'i don du spyod pa ni tshangs par spyod pa ste /
T02D2534:232a-29: de dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni tshangs par spyod pa can no //
T02D2534:232a-30: brtul zhugs thams cad kyi mchog gi phul du byung ba ni brtul zhugs mchog go //
T02D2534:232a-31: glegs bam la la las ni /
T02D2534:232a-32: tshangs par spyod pa brtul zhugs mchog / ces zer ba la de'i don ni 'di yin te /
T02D2534:232a-33: brtul zhugs thams cad kyi rtsa ba ni tshangs par spyod pa yin la ;
T02D2534:232a-34: de bas na thams cad du gzhon nu'i tshangs par
T02D2534:232a-35: spyod pa'i brtul zhugs ma nyams pa dang ldan pas
T02D2534:232a-36: na / tshangs par spyod pa'i brtul zhugs mchog /
T02D2534:232a-38: com ldan 'das rje btsun 'jam dpal lo //
T02D2534:232a-39: dka' thub thams cad las rnam pa thams cad du
T02D2534:232b-0: yongs su mthar phyin cing @232b rdzogs par 'gyur la
T02D2534:232b-1: / dka' thub de rnams kyi mthar phyin pa'i mtha' la dgyes pas na dka' thub mthar phyin no //
T02D2534:232b-2: rlung dang chu lo ma za ba dang /
T02D2534:232b-3: me lnga bsten pa la sogs pa'i dka' thub shin
T02D2534:232b-4: tu drag po'i khyad par ston par mdzad pas na
T02D2534:232b-6: rig byed rtogs pa'i brtul zhugs de ni gtsang gnas zhes bya ba la /
T02D2534:232b-8: rig byed thams cad kyi pha rol tu rab kyi
T02D2534:232b-9: mthar phyin pas mgon po 'jam dpal la yang gtsang
T02D2534:232b-11: des 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la dga' bar bya
T02D2534:232b-12: ba'i phyir de'i gzugs 'dzin par mdzad pas na gtsang
T02D2534:232b-13: gnas so // goo ta ma'i rigs kyi rab mchog
T02D2534:232b-14: tu gyur pas na dam pa goo ta ma ste
T02D2534:232b-15: gnas so // / thams cad kyi gtso bor gyur pa'o //
T02D2534:232b-16: yang na goo ta ma zhes bya ba'i sgra ni stong pa nyid kyi ye shes la bya ste /
T02D2534:232b-17: thams cad du song bas na thams cad khyab pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2534:232b-18: de'i rigs su gyur pas na goo ta ma'o //
T02D2534:232b-19: de nyid kyis na dam pa ste /
T02D2534:232b-20: thams cad kyi gtso bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2534:232b-21: dka' thub thos pa skye gnas te //
T02D2534:232b-22: de dag bram ze'i rgyu yin no //
T02D2534:232b-23: zhes bya bas yon tan gsum dang ldan pa ni bram ze yin par bshad la /
T02D2534:232b-24: mgon po 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyang dus dpag tu med par dka' thub spyod par mdzad pa dang /
T02D2534:232b-25: mtha' yas pa'i thos pa dang ldan pa dang /
T02D2534:232b-26: zag pa med pa'i stong pa nyid kyi dgongs pa las nges par 'khrungs pa yin te /
T02D2534:232b-27: yon tan de gsum dan ldan pas na bram ze chen po'i mchog yin no //
T02D2534:232b-28: yang na bram ze gang zhe na /
T02D2534:232b-29: sdig pa'i chos rnams las phyir rol tu gyur pa'o
T02D2534:232b-30: zhes gsungs pas sdig pa'i chos thams cad dang bral
T02D2534:232b-32: tshangs pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams gdul bar bya
T02D2534:232b-33: ba'i phyir tshangs pa'i gzugs kyi chos stong par mdzad
T02D2534:232b-34: pa'i phyir dang / mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las
T02D2534:232b-35: 'das pa'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pas na tshangs
T02D2534:232b-36: pa'i phyir dang / pa'o // tshangs pa shes bya ba la /
T02D2534:232b-37: de la yi ge aa ni snyan tshig gi rig byed do //
T02D2534:232b-38: yi ge au ni mchod spyin gyi rig byed do //
T02D2534:232b-39: yi ge ma ni srid srung gi rig byed do //
T02D2534:232b-40: de bzhin du yi ge aa ni khyab 'jug ste /
T02D2534:232b-41: yi ge rnams las yi ge aa ni pa yin no zhes bshad pas so //
T02D2534:232b-42: srung bas na yi ge au ste /
T02D2534:232b-44: mi rnams skyong bas na ma ste /
T02D2534:233a-0: @233a * // de bzhin du yi ge aa ni snying stobs so //
T02D2534:233a-1: yi ge au ni rdul lo //
T02D2534:233a-2: yi ge ma ni mun pa ste /
T02D2534:233a-3: de dag ston par byed pa'i yi ge aom gyi sgra ni bram ze'o //
T02D2534:233a-4: de ji lta ba bzhin du rig pas na tshangs pa shes pa ste /
T02D2534:233a-5: aom zhes bya ba tshangs pa mchog /'byung po kun gyi snyid la gnas //
T02D2534:233a-6: yid kyi sgrol mar gyur pa yi //
T02D2534:233a-7: mi g-yo par ni snang bar byed //
T02D2534:233a-8: glog dang shel ltar snang ba dang //
T02D2534:233a-9: nyi ma 'char ka lta bur ni //
T02D2534:233a-10: gang gi snying la gnas mthong ba //
T02D2534:233a-11: tshangs pa mchog ni des mthong ngo //
T02D2534:233a-12: gnas gsum dang ni tsam gsum dang //
T02D2534:233a-13: yon tan gsum dang lha gsum du //
T02D2534:233a-14: gug skyed dang bral gug skyed bcas //
T02D2534:233a-15: gang gis de rigs tshangs pa shes //
T02D2534:233a-16: zhes bya ba ni nges brjod kyi rig byed bsdus pa'i rab tu byed pa'o //
T02D2534:233a-17: bdag tshangs pa yin par bstan pa'i phyir smras pa //
T02D2534:233a-18: dbang phyug gis ni lung bstan srog /'byung ba dbang po blo med par //
T02D2534:233a-19: gang gis rang bzhin nyid bzhin gsal //
T02D2534:233a-21: rlabs drug mthar 'gro tshangs pa ste //
T02D2534:233a-22: ma yin ma yin gang smra ba //
T02D2534:233a-23: dga' ba rtag pa tsam zhig ste //
T02D2534:233a-24: gang zhig smra ba rgyu mchog yin //
T02D2534:233a-25: de las skye ba 'gro ba'i mdo //
T02D2534:233a-26: sngon gyi skye ba skye dgu'i bdag / tshangs pa dag tu gang bshad pa ;
T02D2534:233a-27: / ma lus 'byin par byed pa'i rgyu //
T02D2534:233a-28: sa ni rkang pa lha yul mgo //
T02D2534:233a-29: nyi ma zla ba mig yin zhing //
T02D2534:233a-30: lto ba nam kha'i khong gang yin //
T02D2534:233a-31: de ni yongs su rgyu mchog skyes //
T02D2534:233a-32: mchod spyin gyi rig byed bsdus pa'i rab tu byed pa'o //
T02D2534:233a-33: gang tshe na ni shes gyur pa //
T02D2534:233a-34: thub chen sangs rgyas grub par 'gyur //
T02D2534:233a-35: de tshe bzhi pa rnam shes pa //
T02D2534:233a-36: dbang phyug ces ni bya bar grags //
T02D2534:233a-37: bzhi pa las 'das dam pa'i bdag / skye dang 'jig pa spangs pa ste //
T02D2534:233a-38: bcings dang grol las nges 'das shing //
T02D2534:233a-39: rtag par kun tu 'gro ba'i gtso //
T02D2534:233a-40: gnyid med rmi lam gnyid stug pa //
T02D2534:233a-41: bzhi pa mnyam par gnas par 'gyur //
T02D2534:233a-42: gang du bzhi pa thim 'gyur dang //
T02D2534:233a-43: de ni rtag pa'i tshangs pa yin //
T02D2534:233a-44: snyan tshig gi rig byed bsdus pa'i rab tu byed pa'o //
T02D2534:233a-45: nam mkha' 'di ni mtha' yas te //
T02D2534:233a-46: de ni mi zad mi 'gyur bstan //
T02D2534:233a-47: sna tshogs skye gnas tshangs pa mchog / rtag tu 'byung po'i skyabs mchog yin //
T02D2534:233b-0: mi zad @233b ba yi bdag mchog ni //
T02D2534:233b-1: gang gis bdag la gnas mthong ba //
T02D2534:233b-2: yon tan med kyang yo tan spyod //
T02D2534:233b-4: de ni gzhan la bdag gzhan zhes //
T02D2534:233b-5: de ltar blo ngan rnams kyis mthong //
T02D2534:233b-6: de ni gang yin bdag yin par //
T02D2534:233b-7: shes pa nges par grol bar 'gyur //
T02D2534:233b-8: bdag ni tshangs pa bdag tshangs par //

T02D2534:233b-10: srin po'am byin za dag dang ni //
T02D2534:233b-11: las rnams kyi ni reg pa med //
T02D2534:233b-12: srid srung gi rig byed bsdus pa'i rab ru byed pa'o //

T02D2534:233b-18: gcig dang du ma nyid du rnam rtog spang //

T02D2534:233b-20: rtse gcig bsam pas rnam par bsgom par bya //

T02D2534:233b-23: rnam rtog spyod yul thams cad spangs ni //
T02D2534:233b-24: rgyun mi 'chad par sems gzhan bsgom par bya //

T02D2534:233b-45: bral bas na zhi ba nyid dam rnam par rtog

T02D2534:234a-3: de'i legs pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa yin la /

T02D2534:234a-5: mya ngan las 'das pa dang nye ba'o //
T02D2534:234a-6: de yang 'dis nges par 'byung bas na nges par 'byung ba ste /
T02D2534:234a-7: de ltar nges par 'byung bar rnam par gzhag go //
T02D2534:234a-8: bde ba dang sdug bsngal dag zad pa ni thar

T02D2534:234a-18: po ste // don to // gzhan rnams kyis brgal bar mi nus pas na thub pa med pa'o //
T02D2534:234a-19: gnyis pa med pas na dpe med pa'o //

T02D2534:234a-28: dngos po thams cad kyi rgya ma yin pas nas ban bral lo //
T02D2534:234a-29: ci'i phyir de ltar gzhan gyi grub pa'i mtha'i grol
T02D2534:234a-30: ba la sogs pa'i gzugs su bcom ldan 'das rje

T02D2534:234b-2: chos kyi sku dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang
T02D2534:234b-3: sprul pa'i sku'i yon tan bstan par bya'i phyir rdul
T02D2534:234b-4: med ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

T02D2534:234b-6: sems kyi rnam par rtog pa'i rdul sna tshogs pa dang bral bas na rdul bral lo //
T02D2534:234b-7: bag la nyal dang kun nas dkris pa sna tshogs pa dang bral bas na dri ma med pa'i //
T02D2534:234b-8: phyi dang nang gi rnam par rtog pa'i gnas ngan
T02D2534:234b-9: len gyi bag chags kyi nyes pa spangs pas na
T02D2534:234b-11: nang du gyur pa'i bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin par
T02D2534:234b-12: zhen pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba dang bral
T02D2534:234b-14: yang na snga ma ma'i bshad par gyur pa ni phyi ma phyi ma'i rnam grangs nyid yin pa'am /
T02D2534:234b-15: sgra 'di dag ni chos kyi sku ston par byed pa yin te /
T02D2534:234b-16: tshig la la la tshig gzhan la la dag gis
T02D2534:234b-17: don rtogs par 'gyur bas rnam grangs su bstan pa

T02D2534:234b-22: pa'i sems tsam so sor rtogs pas na rdul med

T02D2534:234b-25: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs rnam par snang ba

T02D2534:234b-27: do // // aom tishtha badzra badzra a'atma ko& ham
T02D2534:234b-28: zhes zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rdo rje
T02D2534:234b-29: rtse lnga pa'i gzugs kyis mu stegs pa'i rnam pa
T02D2534:234b-30: sna tshogs pa'i dregs pa 'joms pas dri ma med
T02D2534:234b-31: do // // pa'o // aom sa manta bha dro&

T02D2534:234b-46: su chud pas na sad pa'i bdag go //

T02D2534:235a-3: sangs rgyas rnams la de lta bu'i nan tan nyams
T02D2534:235a-4: su len pa bskyed par mdzad pas na kun shes

T02D2534:235a-6: nyam thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las mchog

T02D2534:235a-17: shes pa ni don dam par med pas rnam par
T02D2534:235a-18: shes pa'i chos nyid las 'das pa ste chos kyi
T02D2534:235a-19: sku'o // rnam par shes pa'i chos dang phral na
T02D2534:235a-20: ni rnam pa thams cad du bems por 'gyur ro

T02D2534:235a-26: de la rnam pa thams cad du mo gsham gyi bu bzhin du med do //
T02D2534:235a-27: shes pa dang shes par byed pa dad /
T02D2534:235a-29: khong du chud par byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i
T02D2534:235a-30: tshogs la spyod pa las gzhan pa gnyis su med
T02D2534:235a-31: pa'i ye shes kyi skus sems can thams cad kyi
T02D2534:235a-32: don gyi bya ba byed par ji ltar nus she

T02D2534:235a-41: rnam par rtog med lhun gyis grub //
T02D2534:235a-43: dus gsum sangs rgyas las byed pa //
T02D2534:235a-44: zhes bya ba la ji ltar gcig pus dus gsum
T02D2534:235a-45: gyi sangs rgyas kyi bya ba mdzad par 'gyur zhe

T02D2534:235b-2: chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di na gnas pa ste /
T02D2534:235b-6: stong pa nyid do zhes gsungs pas gcig pu nyid
T02D2534:235b-7: kyis kyang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi bya ba

T02D2534:235b-13: sku tshe rigs dang tshad kyis min //

T02D2534:235b-16: rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad pa yin no //

T02D2534:235b-18: sangs rgyas thog ma tham med //

T02D2534:235b-27: skye bo de dag nga mi mthong //
T02D2534:235b-28: sangs rgyas rnams ni chos nyid ltar //
T02D2534:235b-29: 'dren pa rnams ni chos kyi sku //
T02D2534:235b-30: zhes ji skad du gsungs pa lta bu'o //

T02D2534:235b-32: gang las kyang skye ba med pas na rgyu med pa ste /

T02D2534:235b-36: ye shes nyid gcig pu gnyis su med pa ni mig dang 'dra bas na mig ste /
T02D2534:235b-37: chos kyi sku gang yin pa de la //
T02D2534:235b-38: ye shes mig gcig dri ma med //
T02D2534:235b-40: 'dir chos thams cad rgyal zhing de'i bdag nyid du

T02D2534:235b-45: phyogs ltar na rab tu sad pa'i rnam par snang

T02D2534:236a-1: chub pa rnam pa lnga yongs su rdzogs pa'i de

T02D2534:239b-35: mtshon cha chen po rdo rje chos //

T02D2534:269a-31: kun dga' bo snyigs ma lnga'i tshe skyes pa'i sems
T02D2534:269a-32: can de dag ni dman pa mos pa dag ste
T02D2534:269a-33: / de dag sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mngon
T02D2534:269a-34: par mos pas kun dga' bo sangs rgyas bcom ldan
T02D2534:269a-35: 'das thabs la mthas pas de ltar de dag la
T02D2534:269a-36: / chos ston to // kun dga' bo sems can
T02D2534:269a-37: gang dag rgya chen po la mos pa de dag
T02D2534:269a-38: / chos ston to // ni nyung ste / kun
T02D2534:269a-39: dga' po sems can gang dag dman pa la mos
T02D2534:269a-40: pa de dag gi ched du de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2534:269a-41: thabs mkhas pa de lta bus chos ston to //
T02D2534:269a-42: thabs 'dis sangs rgyas kyi chos ston to zhes gsungs so //
T02D2534:269a-44: 'di la dngos po grub pa med //
T02D2534:269a-45: 'di la sems can yod ma yin //
T02D2534:269a-46: ci nas sus kyang mi mthong ba //
T02D2534:269a-47: khams de rnam par lta bar gyis //
T02D2534:269a-48: nyin dang mtshan du g-yel med par //
T02D2534:269a-49: sems can rnams la de skad sgrogs //
T02D2534:269a-50: bdag ni 'ga' zhig sgrogs so zhes //
T02D2534:269a-51: rlom sems de la ci yang med //
T02D2534:269a-54: spros pa med cing rnyog pa med //
T02D2534:269a-55: chags pa med pa'i dbyings kyang ston //
T02D2534:269a-56: sangs rgyas chos rnams ma lus par //
T02D2534:269a-57: rnam par mthong nas ston par byed //
T02D2534:269a-58: sangs rgyas kyis ni gang gsungs pa //
T02D2534:269b-0: @269b chos dang ring bar mi rtog cing //
T02D2534:269b-1: chos dang nye bar mi rtog ste //
T02D2534:269b-2: de phyir de dag 'dre ba med //
T02D2534:269b-3: sgrogs kyang 'dre ba yod min zhing //
T02D2534:269b-4: sems can dpag tu med la brjod //
T02D2534:269b-5: sems can de dag mthong ba med //
T02D2534:269b-6: des de nyan thas zhes brjod do //
T02D2534:269b-7: kun dga' 'di la dgongs nas ni //
T02D2534:269b-8: nga yis nyan thos yongs su bstan //
T02D2534:269b-9: byang chub sems dpa' mi gnas pa //
T02D2534:269b-10: nyan thos de ltar shes par gyis //
T02D2534:269b-13: nyon mongs med cing bral ba med //
T02D2534:269b-14: chos med rnam par smin pa med //
T02D2534:269b-15: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun med //
T02D2534:269b-16: mya ngan 'das med rab byung med //
T02D2534:269b-17: de la zhi ngas ngag yang med /
T02D2534:269b-18: lhag mthong yang ni yod ma yin //
T02D2534:269b-19: yo byad bsnyungs med 'dod chung med //
T02D2534:269b-20: le lo med cing brtson 'grus med //
T02D2534:269b-21: rgod pa med cing 'gyod pa med //
T02D2534:269b-22: sdom pa'ang yad pa ma yin te //
T02D2534:269b-23: gang phyir sdom par gyur pa yi //
T02D2534:269b-24: 'di la dngos po grub pa med //
T02D2534:269b-25: 'di la rtog pa'ang rnam rtog med //
T02D2534:269b-26: rnam mi rtog pa'ang yod ma yin //
T02D2534:269b-27: 'jigs ba med cing dgon pa med //
T02D2534:269b-28: bcings pa med cing thar pa med //
T02D2534:269b-30: 'jug pa med par nges par bstan //
T02D2534:269b-31: chos rnams thams cad sgra med de //
T02D2534:269b-32: sgra nyid kyis ni brjod pa yin //
T02D2534:269b-33: 'di ni mngon sum gyur pas na //
T02D2534:269b-34: zad mi shes pa'i tshul bstan to //
T02D2534:269b-35: ting nge 'dzin 'di la brten nas ni //
T02D2534:269b-36: de ni sgra la mi chags so //
T02D2534:269b-37: ci 'dra gang gi gang yin pa //
T02D2534:269b-38: sgra de des ni mngon sum shes //
T02D2534:269b-39: chos kun 'di ltar mnyam pa ste //
T02D2534:269b-40: brjod pa med cing gnas pa med //
T02D2534:269b-41: 'di ni mngon sum gyur pas na //
T02D2534:269b-42: tshu rol nas ni pha rol song //
T02D2534:269b-43: de ni smod pa med pa ste //
T02D2534:269b-44: rang rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes brjod do //
T02D2534:269b-47: len pa len pas ma yin te //
T02D2534:269b-48: stong par de yin rnam par bshig / de ni dngos por grub med de //
T02D2534:269b-49: smig rgyu la ni chu bzhin no //
T02D2534:269b-50: de yi srid par 'du shes gang //
T02D2534:269b-51: de yi gnyen 'du shes sdig can //
T02D2534:269b-52: de ni de yi rang bzhin gyis //
T02D2534:269b-53: rtag par shin tu dngos med ces //
T02D2534:269b-54: de la skye ba thams cad med //
T02D2534:269b-55: de la 'chi ba yod ma yin //
T02D2534:269b-56: de ni nam yang gang zhig tu //
T02D2534:269b-57: skye bar 'gyur ba gang yang med //
T02D2534:269b-58: rkyen rnams 'di dag shes nas ni //
T02D2534:269b-59: de ni gang la'ang mi ngas te //
T02D2534:269b-60: rnag sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgrar //
T02D2534:269b-61: byang chub sems dpa' rab tu bstan //
T02D2534:269b-62: zhes rgya cher gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2534:270a-0: de bas na theg pa thams cad ni theg pa gcig la zhugs pa yin @270a * //
T02D2534:270a-2: theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas //
T02D2534:270a-4: nyon mongs khams rnams dag pa'i bdag / ces bya ba la /
T02D2534:270a-5: nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rgyur gyur pa ni /
T02D2534:270a-9: spungs dang skye sgo rigs kyi don //
T02D2534:270a-10: phung po skye mched khams rnams so //
T02D2534:270a-14: gti mug ni mi dge ba'i rtsa ba gsum ste /
T02D2534:270a-15: 'di dag ni rang nyid kyang mi dge ba'i ngo bo nyid yin la /
T02D2534:270a-16: mi dge ba gzhan rnams kyi yang rtsa bar 'gyur
T02D2534:270a-17: ba yin pas mi dge ba'i rtsa ba zhes bya'o
T02D2534:270a-18: // de rnams rnam par dag pas chos thams cad bdag med par mthong ba ste /
T02D2534:270a-19: des rtsa ba ma lus par drungs nas phyung bas
T02D2534:270a-20: nyon mongs pa'i khams rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid
T02D2534:270a-21: 'ba' zhig gang yin pa de ni /
T02D2534:270a-22: nyon mongs khams rnams dag pa'i bdag / ces bya ba la /
T02D2534:270a-23: yang na nyon mongs pa rnams kyi khams ni rang
T02D2534:270a-24: bzhin dang ngo bo nyid ces bya ba'i don to
T02D2534:270a-25: / rang bzhin gang yin zhe na /
T02D2534:270a-26: chos thams cad dang nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rnag
T02D2534:270a-27: bzhin ni gdod ma nas ma skyes pa yin pas
T02D2534:270a-28: na rnag bzhin rnam par dag pa'i bdag yid kyi
T02D2534:270a-29: ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de la de skad
T02D2534:270a-30: ces bya'o // las kyi khams rnams zad byed pa /
T02D2534:270a-34: lung du ma bstan pa kun nas slong bar byed pa'i sems ni las kyi khams so //
T02D2534:270a-35: bdag dang bdag gis gzung ba dang 'dzin pa bskyed
T02D2534:270a-36: pa la mngon par zhen pa las de 'bung bar
T02D2534:270a-37: 'gyur la / phyin ci log de skyed par byed
T02D2534:270a-38: pa'i las kyi khams kun du bskyed pa yang skye
T02D2534:270a-39: ba med pa'i chos can du bstan pas na /
T02D2534:270a-40: las kyi khams rnams zad byed pa //
T02D2534:270a-42: chu bo rgya mtsho kun las brgal //
T02D2534:270a-49: de yang sems can rnams kyi legs par phrogs pas na chu bo ste /
T02D2534:270a-51: chu bo de ni rgal dka' ba'i phyir rgya mtsho dang 'dra bas na rgyas mtsho'o //
T02D2534:270a-52: de las yang dag par kun du brgal ba ni
T02D2534:270a-53: rnam pa thams cad du pha rol tu byon pas
T02D2534:270a-55: sbyor ba'i dgon pa las byung ba //
T02D2534:270b-3: sbyor ba de rnams ni shin tu 'jigs su rung bas na dgon pa'o //
T02D2534:270b-4: de rnams las byung ba ni nges bar mthong ba ste /
T02D2534:270b-6: sbyar ba'i dgon pa las byung ba //
T02D2534:270b-8: des pa'i tshig bi yang khams dang /
T02D2534:270b-11: sa rnams su sbyor zhing sems can rnams chu bor lhung bar 'gyur bas na sbyor ba zhes bya'o //
T02D2534:270b-12: nyon mongs nye ba'i kun nyon mongs //
T02D2534:270b-13: bag chags bcas par gtan spangs pa //
T02D2534:270b-15: de la nyon mongs pa ni dgu bcu rtsa brgyad do //
T02D2534:270b-16: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa yang de nyid de /
T02D2534:270b-17: de rnams mdor bsdus pa dang rgyas par phye nas gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2534:270b-18: de la kun du sbyor ba dgu ste /
T02D2534:270b-23: lta ba dang mchog tu 'dzin pa dang /
T02D2534:270b-27: de la khams gsum gyi 'dod chags zhen pa'i mtshan
T02D2534:270b-28: nyid rgya skyegs zhu bar sbyar blta bu'i chos ni
T02D2534:270b-30: rjes su chags pa nyid kun du sbyor ba'o //
T02D2534:270b-31: sems can rnams la gnod cing gsod pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D2534:270b-32: can sa ban kha ba lta bu'i chos ni khong
T02D2534:270b-33: khro ba ste / khong khro ba nyid kun du sbyor ba'o //
T02D2534:270b-34: bdag dang gzhan du nye bar btags nas sems mtho
T02D2534:270b-35: ba'i mtshan nyid can du skyes bu rengs pa lta
T02D2534:270b-37: de yang rnam pa bdun te /
T02D2534:270b-40: nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal dang /
T02D2534:270b-41: nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang /
T02D2534:270b-43: cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang /
T02D2534:270b-45: de la nga rgyal ni chung du bas bdag rus dang /
T02D2534:270b-51: bzo la sogs pa dag gis bye brag tu 'phags pa'am /
T02D2534:270b-52: rus la sogs pa 'dra ba dang mtshungs so snyam
T02D2534:270b-53: pa de'i rgyu las byung ba'i sems kyi rlom sems
T02D2534:270b-54: de ni nga rgyal bzhes bya'o // che ba'i nga
T02D2534:270b-55: rgyal ni mtshungs pa bas bdag rus la sogs pa
T02D2534:270b-56: dag gis bye brag tu 'phags pa'am /
T02D2534:270b-57: che ba dang mtshungs so snyam pa des drangs pa'i sems khengs pa ni che ba'i nga rgyal lo //
T02D2534:270b-58: nga rgyal la kyang nga rgyal ni che bas kyang
T02D2534:270b-59: bdag ches che'o snyam pa des drangs pa'i sems khengs
T02D2534:270b-60: pa'o // nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal ni bdag tu lta ba'i rjes las byung ba'i sems khengs ba'o //
T02D2534:271a-0: mngon pa'i nga rgyal ni rgyun @271a * //
T02D2534:271a-1: du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la sogs pa gong ma'i
T02D2534:271a-2: khyad par thob par bya ba ma thob par bdag
T02D2534:271a-3: gis thob po snyam pa de'i rgyu las byung ba'i
T02D2534:271a-5: cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal ni rigs la sogs
T02D2534:271a-6: pa khyad par ches 'phags pa bdag cung zad cig
T02D2534:271a-7: gis chung bar blta zhing des rlom sems pa'o //
T02D2534:271a-8: log pa'i da rgyal ni yon tan ma yin pa dang ldan par blta zhing des rlom sems pa'o //
T02D2534:271a-9: nga rgyal bdun po 'di dag ni nga rgyal gyis kun du sbyor ba zhes bya'o //
T02D2534:271a-10: ma rig pa zhes bya ba ni khams gsum po'i
T02D2534:271a-11: mi shes pa mi rtog pa'i mtshan nyid long ba
T02D2534:271a-12: lta bu ste / rig pa'i gnyen po ni ma rig pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2534:271a-13: dag pa ni gnyen po la gzhag pa'i phyir mi mdzad pa dang /
T02D2534:271a-14: mi bden pa la sogs pa bzhin no //

T02D2534:271a-16: 'jig tshogs dang mthar 'dzin pa dang log par lta ba gsum ni lta ba'i kun du sbyor ba'o //
T02D2534:271a-17: de la nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po
T02D2534:271a-18: bdag med pa bdag gi med pa rnams la bdag
T02D2534:271a-19: dang bdag gi tshul gyis zhugs pa nyon mongs pa

T02D2534:271a-21: de ni 'jig pa yang yin la tshogs kyang yin pas 'jig tshogs bo //
T02D2534:271a-22: de la lta bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'o //
T02D2534:271a-23: chad pa ma yin pa rtag pa ma yin pa de dag nyid la chad pa dang /
T02D2534:271a-24: rtag pa'i tshul gyis zhugs pa nyon mongs pa can gyi blo ni mthar 'dzin par lta ba ste /
T02D2534:271a-25: mtha' gnyis su zhugs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2534:271a-29: de thob par byed pa'i lam yang med do snyam
T02D2534:271a-30: du de ltar dngos po yod pa yang dag par
T02D2534:271a-31: 'jig par zhugs pa nyon mongs pa can gyi blo
T02D2534:271a-32: gang yin pa de ni log par lta ba'o //
T02D2534:271a-33: lta ba gsum po de dag ni lta ba'i kun du sbyor ba'o //

T02D2534:271a-39: mchog tu 'dzin pa'i blo'i bye brag gang yin pa

T02D2534:271b-0: tshul khrims ni 'chal @271b ba'i tshul khrims spangs pa'o //
T02D2534:271b-3: ba lang gi brtul zhugs dang /
T02D2534:271b-5: thab dang thal ba'i nang na nyal ba dang /
T02D2534:271b-6: skra 'bal ba dang 'bab stegs su 'khru ba dang /
T02D2534:271b-7: 'bras bu dang rtsa ba zab dang /
T02D2534:271b-8: ral pa thogs pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D2534:271b-9: dag pa'i bdag nyid ma yin pa de gnyi ga

T02D2534:271b-11: ze'i cho ga can gtsang sbra 'dod pa lta bu'i
T02D2534:271b-12: chos gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims dang /
T02D2534:271b-14: mchog tu 'dzin pa'i gnyis po de dag ni mchog tu 'dzin pa'i kun du sbyor ba'o //
T02D2534:271b-15: the tshom ni sdug bsngal ba dang /
T02D2534:271b-18: lam zhes bya ba bden pa rnams la yid gnyis za ba las lam kha brag dang /
T02D2534:271b-19: rtsa mi 'dra ba'i chos nyid de /
T02D2534:271b-21: 'di sdug bsngal ma yin snyam pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D2534:271b-22: the tshom nyid kun du sbyor bas the tshom gyi kun du sbyor ba'o //
T02D2534:271b-23: phrag dog ni pha rol gyi 'byor pa la mi bzod pa ste /
T02D2534:271b-24: pha rol po nor dang ldan nas /
T02D2534:271b-25: mkhas nas bkur ba rnams la sems khong nas 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba'i don gang yin pa'o //
T02D2534:271b-26: phrag dog nyid kun du sbyor bas phrag dog gi kun du sbyor ba'o //
T02D2534:271b-27: dngos po 'di dag las gzhan la mi gtong ngo
T02D2534:271b-28: snyam du sems kyi kun du 'dzin pa gang yin
T02D2534:271b-29: pa de ni ser sna ste /
T02D2534:271b-30: de nyid kun du sbyor bas ser sna'i kun du sbyor ba'o //
T02D2534:271b-31: kun du sbyor ba'i don ni 'ching ba'i don te /
T02D2534:271b-32: ji skad du 'jig rten gyi mgon pos kyang /
T02D2534:271b-33: mig gzugs rnams la kun du mi sbyor la /
T02D2534:271b-34: gzugs rnams kyang mig la ma yin mod kyi /
T02D2534:271b-35: de la 'dod pa la 'dod chags gang yin pa de ni 'dir kun du sbyor pa ste /
T02D2534:271b-36: dper na ba lang nag po yang ba lang dkar po la kun du mi sbyor la /
T02D2534:271b-37: ba lang dkar po yang ba lang nag po la ma yin no /
T02D2534:271b-38: zhes rgya cher gsungs pa lta bu'o //
T02D2534:271b-39: kun du sbyor ba rnams ni 'ching ba'i don yin
T02D2534:271b-40: pas kun du sbyor ba gang yin pa de ni
T02D2534:271b-42: 'on kyang gtso bor gyur ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdo las 'dod chags ni 'ching ba //
T02D2534:271b-44: gti mug ni 'ching ba zhes 'ching ba gsum gsungs te /
T02D2534:272a-0: de dag gi mtshan nyid ni bshad zin @272a * //
T02D2534:272a-9: the tshom gyi phra rgyas so //

T02D2534:272a-13: rnam pa'i bye brag de dbye bar bya'o //
T02D2534:272a-14: de la 'dod pa rnams la 'dod chags pa ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags so //
T02D2534:272a-15: de nyid phra rgyas yin pas 'dod pa la 'dod chags kyi phra rgyas so //
T02D2534:272a-16: de la 'dod par gtogs pa'i 'dod chags sdug bsngal dang /

T02D2534:272a-38: pas gsungs so // ba dang / // par bya'o

T02D2534:286b-38: lha rjes su dran pa ste /
T02D2534:286b-39: de rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid ni sngar bshad pas 'dir yang ma bshad do //
T02D2534:286b-40: rtag tu phyin ci ma log pa'i rjes su dran
T02D2534:286b-41: pa drug dang ldan pas na rjes su dran pa
T02D2534:286b-42: drug ces bya'o // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
T02D2534:286b-44: byang chub sems dpa'i sems gang la yod pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'o //
T02D2534:286b-45: de nyid gcig tu gzhan gyi don la 'jug pa ni sems dpa' chen po'o //
T02D2534:287a-0: yang byang chub sems dpa'i bdag nyid can gyi sems ni byang @287a * //
T02D2534:287a-2: kun tu 'gro ba'i chos kyi dbyings thugs su chud
T02D2534:287a-3: nas mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i phyir sems dpa' chen
T02D2534:287a-4: po'o // rnam pa thams cad du yul che pa'i rdzu 'phrul brnyes pas na rdzu 'phrul chen po'o //
T02D2534:287a-5: de bzhin du 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes
T02D2534:287a-6: thugs su chud pas na 'jig rten las 'das pa'o
T02D2534:287a-7: // shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mtha' //
T02D2534:287a-8: zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T02D2534:287a-9: phyin pa dang mngon par ldan pa'i chos kyi sku
T02D2534:287a-11: rnam pa thams cad du de'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pas na /
T02D2534:287a-12: shes rab kyi ni de nyid thob //
T02D2534:287a-14: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de kho
T02D2534:287a-15: na nyid ni dri ma med pa'i de bzhin nyid
T02D2534:287a-16: do // de kho na nyid kyi rang bzhin ni chos kyi sku'i bdag nyid can yin pas na /
T02D2534:287a-17: sems la sems shes pa med do zhes brtag par mi bya ste /
T02D2534:287a-18: sbyor ba bstan pas na spyi las spyi khas blang par bya ba yin no //
T02D2534:287a-19: yang na 'di ni nye bar gzhag pa tsam du zad kyi /
T02D2534:287a-20: de la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2534:287a-21: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo
T02D2534:287a-22: nyid yin yang bdag dang gzhan gyi dbye bas tha
T02D2534:287a-23: snyad du bya ba bden pa gnyis kyi dbang du
T02D2534:287a-25: bdag rig gzhan rig thams cad pa /
T02D2534:287a-26: kun la phan pa'i gang zag mchog / ces bya ba gsungs pa yin te /
T02D2534:287a-27: de la so sor rang gi rig pa'i chos nyid kyi tshul gyis na bdag rig pa'o //
T02D2534:287a-28: sgyu ma lta bu'i sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyis
T02D2534:287a-29: na gdul bya rnams la khong du chud par mdzad
T02D2534:287a-31: rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i dngos po thams cad
T02D2534:287a-32: kyi ngo bo nyid chos kyi dbyings su bye brag
T02D2534:287a-33: med pas na thams cad pa'o //
T02D2534:287a-34: sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
T02D2534:287a-35: bde ba rdzogs par mdzad pas na kun la phan pa'o //
T02D2534:287a-36: sems can thams cad kyi gtso bo'i skyes bu yin pas na gang zag mchog ste /
T02D2534:287a-37: rigs pa can gyis brtags pa'i gang zag ni ma yin te /
T02D2534:287a-38: de ni rnam pa thams cad du med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2534:287a-39: dper bya kun las 'das pa ste //
T02D2534:287a-40: shes dang shes bya'i bdag po mchog / ces bya ba la /
T02D2534:287a-41: cung zad tsam gyi mnyam pa yang med pa rnam
T02D2534:287a-42: pa thams cad du dper bya ba thams cad las
T02D2534:287b-0: de bzhin @287b gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid du gyur pas shes pa zhes kyang bshad do //
T02D2534:287b-1: legs pa 'dod pa rnams kyi mtho ris dang /
T02D2534:287b-2: thar pa'i rgyur gyur pas na de nyid ni mi
T02D2534:287b-3: shes par bya ba dang bsam par bya ba yin
T02D2534:287b-4: gyi / de las gzhan med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2534:287b-5: de kho na nyid kyi ye shes ma lus par
T02D2534:287b-6: byung ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i
T02D2534:287b-8: thams cad las phul du byung bas na mchog go //
T02D2534:287b-9: chos kyi sbyin pa ni sbyin pa thams cad kyi gtso bo yin la /
T02D2534:287b-10: de stsol bar mdzad pa'i phyir /
T02D2534:287b-11: gtso bo chos kyi sbyin bdag ste //
T02D2534:287b-13: sbyin bdag rnams kyi mchog tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2534:287b-14: phyag rgya bzhi po'i don ston pa //
T02D2534:287b-15: zhes bya ba la phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02D2534:287b-16: dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2534:287b-18: las kyi phyag rgya ni phyag rgya bzhi ste /
T02D2534:287b-19: de rnams kyi don ni phyag rgya bzhi po'i don ston pa'o //
T02D2534:287b-20: de la phyag rgya chen po ni lha dang rjes
T02D2534:287b-21: su mthun par byed pa yin pas longs spyod rdzogs
T02D2534:287b-22: pa'i sku'o // dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni thugs
T02D2534:287b-23: kyi ngo bo nyid yin pas so so rang gi
T02D2534:287b-25: chos kyi phyag rgya ni chos kyi longs spyod kyi
T02D2534:287b-26: byin gyis brlabs las chos kyi de kho na nyid
T02D2534:287b-27: ston pa'i gsang sngags kyi yi ge'i bdag nyid can
T02D2534:287b-28: sna tshogs pa'o // las kyi phyag rgya ni bya
T02D2534:287b-29: ba sgrub pa'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pas sprul
T02D2534:287b-30: pa'i mdzad pa sna tshogs rdzogs par byed pa sprul
T02D2534:287b-31: sna tshogs pa'o // pa'i sku ste / phyag rgya
T02D2534:287b-32: bzhi po de dag gis don ston par mdzad pa'o
T02D2534:287b-33: sna tshogs pa'o // pa'i sku ste / // gang
T02D2534:287b-34: gi phyir nyes pa thams cad las 'das shing yon
T02D2534:287b-35: tan thams cad kyi rang bzhin can yin la /
T02D2534:287b-36: thar pa thams cad dang phun sum tshogs pa thams cad skyed par mdzad pa yin te /
T02D2534:287b-38: 'gro ba'i bsnyen bkur gnas kyi mchog / ces bya'o //
T02D2534:287b-39: nges 'byung gsum po bgrod rnams kyi //
T02D2534:287b-41: khyad par du 'gro ba rnams nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang /
T02D2534:287b-42: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi nges par
T02D2534:287b-43: 'byung ba la ma gtogs pa la gzhan ma dag
T02D2534:287b-44: gis nges par 'byung ba 'thob mi srid par bstan
T02D2534:287b-45: pa'i phyir / nges 'byung gsum po bgrod rnams kyi //
T02D2534:287b-46: zhes bya ba la de'i dngos po gang yin zhe na /
T02D2534:287b-47: 'gro ba'i bsnyen bkur gnas kyi mchog tu gyur pa rje btsun 'jam dpal lo //
T02D2534:288a-3: don gyi dam pa rnam dag dpal //
T02D2534:288a-4: zhes gsungs pa las shes so //
T02D2534:288a-5: de dag kyang 'jig rten gsum gyi skal ba bzang
T02D2534:288a-6: po nyid du gyur pas thams cad kyi mngon par
T02D2534:288a-7: 'dod pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad yang dag
T02D2534:288a-8: par rdzogs par mdzad pas na dpal ldan 'byor pa
T02D2534:288a-9: kun byed pa'o // de bas na 'gro ba rnams
T02D2534:288a-10: kyis nges par 'byung ba gsum bgrod par byed pa
T02D2534:288a-11: kun byed pa'o // yin te / de nyid gcig
T02D2534:288a-12: pu ni 'gro ba rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byed pa'i
T02D2534:288a-14: de las gzhan med do zhes nges par byas pa yin te ;
T02D2534:288a-15: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi
T02D2534:288a-16: ngo bo nyid du gyur pa yang de nyid yin
T02D2534:288a-17: no zhes nges par gzung ba la yang nyes pa
T02D2534:288a-18: med do // da ni mtshan nyid kyi don thams
T02D2534:288a-19: cad nye bar bsdu ba'i sgo nas bcom ldan 'das
T02D2534:288a-20: de rnam pa thams cad du mchod par 'os pa
T02D2534:288a-21: yin no zhes ston cing mtshan thams cad don ji
T02D2534:288a-22: lta ba nyid du bden pa'i mtshan nyid yin par
T02D2534:288a-23: khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad
T02D2534:288a-24: pa lngas phyag 'tshal ba'i khyad par gyis de bzhin
T02D2534:288a-25: gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i tshogs
T02D2534:288a-26: rnams mchod par byas pa'i phyir /
T02D2534:288a-27: mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud //
T02D2534:288a-28: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2534:288a-29: de la mchog sbyin rdo rje ni rje btsun 'jam dpal te /
T02D2534:288a-30: mchog tu gyur pa sangs rgyas nyid stsol bar mdzad pas na mchog sbyin no //
T02D2534:288a-31: mchog sbyin pa la rdo rje ltar mi phyed pas na rdo rje ste /
T02D2534:288a-32: de nyid kyis na mchog ste /
T02D2534:288a-33: thams cad kyi gtso bor gyur pa zhes bya ba'i
T02D2534:288a-34: don yin pas de la yang dag pa'i bod pa
T02D2534:288a-35: ni / mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud //
T02D2534:288a-37: yang dag pa'i mtha' ni de bzhin nyid de /
T02D2534:288a-38: de la kye yang dag pa'i mthar gyur pa khyod la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal lo zhes pa'o //
T02D2534:288a-39: stong nyid las byung khyod la 'dud //
T02D2534:288a-41: stong pa nyid las byung ba ni stong pa nyid
T02D2534:288a-42: las rab tu skyes pa'i phyir stong pa nyid las
T02D2534:288a-43: byung ba'o // yang na stong pa nyid kyi snying
T02D2534:288a-44: po gang la yod pa de la de skad ces
T02D2534:288a-45: byung ba'o // bya ste / stong pa nyid kyi snying po dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2534:288a-46: sangs rgyas byang chub khyad la 'dud //
T02D2534:288b-0: ces bya ba la 'dir yang bod pa @288b ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2534:288b-1: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ni sangs rgyas kyi byang
T02D2534:288b-2: chub bo zhes sbyar ba'am gang gis na sangs rgyas
T02D2534:288b-3: kyi byang chub yin pa de la de skad ces
T02D2534:288b-4: bya ste / khyad par med kyang bya brag tu nye bar btags pa'o //
T02D2534:288b-5: sangs rgyas chags pa khyod la 'dud //
T02D2534:288b-7: sangs rgyas rnams la chags shing shin tu zhen pa
T02D2534:288b-8: gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya ba'am
T02D2534:288b-9: / sangs rgyas rnams kyi chags pa la mngon par
T02D2534:288b-10: zhen pa gang yin pa'o zhes rnam par sbyar ro
T02D2534:288b-11: / // yang na sangs rgyas kyang yin la chags
T02D2534:288b-12: pa yang yin pas na sangs rgyas chags pa ste
T02D2534:288b-13: / // / de kho na nyid thugs su chud
T02D2534:288b-14: cing sangs rgyas pa'i chags pa ni sems can thams
T02D2534:288b-15: cad rjes su dga' bar gyur pa yin pa'i phyir
T02D2534:288b-18: sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'dod pa ni mngon par chags pa ste /
T02D2534:288b-19: 'gro ba rnams la mngon par bzhed pa'o //
T02D2534:288b-20: de'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pas na sangs rgyas 'dod pa'o ;
T02D2534:288b-21: / yang na sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'dod par bya
T02D2534:288b-22: ba yin pas na sangs rgyas 'dod pa yin pa'am
T02D2534:288b-24: sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kun du bzang po
T02D2534:288b-25: la sogs pa 'dod par rab tu ston pa'i phyir
T02D2534:288b-26: ro // sangs rgyas dgyes pa khyod la 'dud //
T02D2534:288b-29: sangs rgyas rnams kyi dgyes pa dang /
T02D2534:288b-30: sangs rgyas rnams kyi rol pa yin pas na sangs rgyas rnams la dgyes shing rol pa'o //
T02D2534:288b-31: yang na dgyes pa ni l'a sye'o //
T02D2534:288b-34: sangs rgyas bzhad pa khyod la 'dud //
T02D2534:288b-36: sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'jum pa ni de kho na
T02D2534:288b-37: nyid thugs su chud pas zhal gyi padma kha dbye
T02D2534:288b-38: ba'o // sangs rgyas kyi bshad pa ni shin tu
T02D2534:288b-39: rmad du byung ba'i don ston cing byang chub sems
T02D2534:288b-40: dpa' chen po lung bstan pa'i ltas ston par byed
T02D2534:288b-41: pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer gyi bye brag go
T02D2534:288b-42: ba'o // // sangs rgyas gsung nyid khyod la 'dud /
T02D2534:288b-45: sangs rgyas kyi gsung ni dam pa'i chos ston pa
T02D2534:288b-46: lta bu'i rkyen gyis sems can rnams gdul bya'i phyir
T02D2534:288b-48: yang na sangs rgyas kyi gsung ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
T02D2534:289a-2: phra ba'i gsung gi bye brag go //
T02D2534:289a-3: sangs rgyas kyi thugs ni sangs rgyas nyid de /
T02D2534:289a-4: thams cad du yang de'i rang bzhin du gyur pa'i phyir de dang /
T02D2534:289a-5: der bshad pas phyag 'tshal ba yin par blta bar bya'o //
T02D2534:289a-6: med pa las byung khyod la 'dud //
T02D2534:289a-9: 'di la dngos po yod pa ma yin pas na /
T02D2534:289a-11: de las byung ba'i skyes pa ste /
T02D2534:289a-12: de las skyes pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2534:289a-13: 'di las sangs rgyas rnams byung bas na sangs rgyas 'byung ba'o //
T02D2534:289a-14: 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams las 'byung bas na /
T02D2534:289a-16: nam mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud //
T02D2534:289a-17: ye shes las byung khyod la 'dud //
T02D2534:289a-19: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chos nyid kyi de kho
T02D2534:289a-20: na nyid las nges par 'byung bas na nam mkha'
T02D2534:289a-21: las byung ba'o // gnyis su med pa'i de kho
T02D2534:289a-22: na nyid kyi ye shes las yang dag par byung
T02D2534:289a-23: las byung ba'o // ba'am / ye shes rnams 'di las byung bas na ye shes las byung ba'o //
T02D2534:289a-25: sangs rgyas rol ston khyod la 'dud //
T02D2534:289a-27: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i spros pa ma lus pa'i dngos
T02D2534:289a-28: po'i bdag nyid thams cad yang dag par ston par
T02D2534:289a-29: mdzad pas na sgyu 'phrul dra ba'o //
T02D2534:289a-30: cha lugs dang rgyan dang gos dang nyams kyi rnam
T02D2534:289a-31: par bkod pa sna tshogs pa'i khyad par gyis bzhugs
T02D2534:289a-32: pas na / sangs rgyas rol ston zhes bya'o //
T02D2534:289a-33: sngar bshad pa'i rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i
T02D2534:289a-34: yon tan gyi rang bzhin thams cad la phyag 'tshal
T02D2534:289a-35: ba dang / de dag thams cad ye shes kyi
T02D2534:289a-36: sku las tha mi dad cing ye shes sku nus
T02D2534:289a-37: mthu la de ltar so sor snang ba yin te
T02D2534:289a-38: ba dang / de bas na / thams cad thams cad khyod la 'dud //
T02D2534:289a-39: ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud //
T02D2534:289a-41: ai ti zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de dag go zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2534:289a-42: yang dag pa'i yon tan gyi mtshan ni de dag yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2534:289a-43: sa rnams ma lus 'byor ba ye shes phun tshogs ldan //
T02D2534:289a-44: sna tshogs tshul rnams dpyad pas rnam kun dag pa grub //
T02D2534:289a-45: 'jam dbyangs mtshan ni yang dag dus rnams thams cad du //
T02D2534:289b-0: dran pas 'gro ba kun gyi phan pa'i don 'byung @289b 'gyur //
T02D2534:289b-1: byang chub yan lag kun 'dus bde gshegs sras 'byor pa //
T02D2534:289b-2: nam mkha'i ngos ltar yangs shing dus tshod rnams las 'das //
T02D2534:289b-3: rgyal ba'i rdo rje rin chen padma sna tshogs ldan //
T02D2534:289b-4: rgyal bas mchod pa 'jam dbyangs mtshan don rtogs las byung //
T02D2534:289b-5: de ltar don yang brtsis nas dad pa'i rjes 'brangs te //
T02D2534:289b-6: gus pa nyung zad tshig la tshig der sems dags drangs //
T02D2534:289b-7: sna tshogs tshul gyi rtogs pas brtags pa'i dra bar ldan //
T02D2534:289b-8: 'jam dbyangs 'jig rten thams cad nyid ni rang dag min //
T02D2534:289b-9: 'jam dbyangs zhabs kyi rgya mtshor cung zad tsam dang pas //
T02D2534:289b-10: 'jug dga' 'di ni rnam bkrol sangs rgyas mthu stobs kyis //
T02D2534:289b-11: bde gshegs sras mchog rnams kyis rtogs bya phra ba 'dir //
T02D2534:289b-12: bdag 'dra'i blo dman skye bo gzhan dag ji ltar
T02D2534:289b-13: 'jug / mdo dang tshad ma'i tshul dang pha rol
T02D2534:289b-14: phyin mi 'gal // lus kun las gsungs dpal gyi cho ga 'gal med dngos //
T02D2534:289b-15: rgyal ba'i gsang sngags don rnams kun gyi rnam dag ldan //
T02D2534:289b-16: phra zhing ma lus tshul rnams bsdus pa'i rgyur gyur yin //
T02D2534:289b-17: bshad pa'i tshul kun nyes pa rnam par spangs gyur pas //
T02D2534:289b-18: ma brtags mi smad mkhas pas nges par brtags te gzung //
T02D2534:289b-19: chos don de nyid mi 'gal shin tu dag gyur pa'i //
T02D2534:289b-20: bshad pa 'di la 'gal ba'i tshul gyis spang mi bya //
T02D2534:289b-21: sngar khyod kyis nga la gsol ba btab pa'i mtshan
T02D2534:289b-22: yang dag par brjod pa 'di ci'i phyir gsungs zhes
T02D2534:289b-23: rtogs par byed pa dag gi phyir /
T02D2534:289b-24: lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang //
T02D2534:289b-25: 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2534:289b-26: su zhig gi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa yin zhe na /
T02D2534:289b-27: bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi sku /
T02D2534:289b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku /
T02D2534:289b-29: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2534:289b-30: rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ye shes kyi sku'o //
T02D2534:289b-31: chos kyi sku'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na de
T02D2534:289b-32: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku'o
T02D2534:289b-33: // dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po nyid kyis ye shes
T02D2534:289b-34: kyi sems dpa' ma lus pa'i ngo bo nyid yin
T02D2534:289b-35: pas na 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'o //
T02D2534:289b-36: de'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa de yang don
T02D2534:289b-37: dang yi ge yongs su dag pas na yongs su
T02D2534:290a-3: ci'i phyir 'di ston par mdzad ces rtogs par byed pa la /
T02D2534:290a-4: khyod kyis dga' ba dang dang ba dang /
T02D2534:290a-5: mgu ba chen po bla na med pa bskyed pa dang zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2534:290a-6: de la tha ma la can gyi tshul gyis yid dga' ba ni yid dga' ba'o //
T02D2534:290a-7: sems kyi rab tu dang ba'i mos pa'i khyad par gyis na dang ba'o //
T02D2534:290a-8: de nyid rab kyi mthar thugs par song ba ni mgu ba chen po'o //

T02D2534:293a-35: kun du spyod pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi sdig pa

T02D2534:293b-5: mi khom pa brgyad po thams cad kyi skye ba'i
T02D2534:293b-6: rgyun mi skye bar byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni

T02D2534:293b-13: dbang po ma tshang ba dang /
T02D2534:293b-14: med par lta ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas mi
T02D2534:293b-15: 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye ba ste

T02D2534:293b-17: 'jigs pa chen po brgyad rnam par zhi bar byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni seng ge dang /
T02D2534:293b-18: glang po che myos pa dang /
T02D2534:293b-19: me drag po 'bar ba'i tshogs can rnam par 'phro ba dang /
T02D2534:293b-20: dug rnam par 'phro bas bsgyings pa'i sprul dang /
T02D2534:293b-21: skra dang kha spu kham pa gyen du brdzes pa

T02D2534:293b-30: dran pa tsam gyis 'jig par byed pa'o //

T02D2534:293b-34: byed pa ni ltas ngan pa ste /

T02D2534:293b-41: byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad stong
T02D2534:293b-42: pa nyid mngon du byas nas bklags pas so //

T02D2534:293b-44: bsod nams thams cad 'phel bar byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags med pa dang /

T02D2534:294a-2: bton pa la sogs pa byas pas gong nas gong du 'phel bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2534:294a-3: tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa thams
T02D2534:294a-4: cad mi skye bar byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni
T02D2534:294a-5: bdag dang bdag gir mngon par zhen pa sngon du
T02D2534:294a-6: 'gro ba ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la
T02D2534:294a-7: byed pa ste / lam la dmigs pa'i sems skye bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2534:294a-8: de chos la bdag med par ston pa'i de kho
T02D2534:294a-9: na nyid yid la byed cing rgyun du bklags pas
T02D2534:294a-11: rgyags pa dang nga rgyal dang dregs pa dang ngar
T02D2534:294a-12: 'dzin pa thams cad ma lus par 'joms par byed
T02D2534:294a-13: pa'o zhes bya ba ni rigs dang nor dang shes
T02D2534:294a-14: rab la sogs pas sems mtho bar 'gyur ba ni
T02D2534:294a-15: rgyags pa'o // nga rgyal ni rnam pa bdun te sngar bshad pa'o //
T02D2534:294a-16: dregs pa ni nga dang mnyam pa med do zhes khengs pa ste /
T02D2534:294a-17: de dag thams cad kyi rtsa ba ni ngar 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa'o //
T02D2534:294a-18: de yang sgyu ma lta bu dang dngos po med
T02D2534:294a-19: pa nyid du khong du chud par ston pas so
T02D2534:294a-20: // sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba thams cad
T02D2534:294a-21: mi skye bar byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni chos
T02D2534:294a-22: kyi de kho na nyid khong du chud pa'i dga'

T02D2534:294a-24: // pa'i phyir ro // de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2534:294a-25: cad kyi snying por gyur pa'o zhes bya ba ni
T02D2534:294a-26: stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid
T02D2534:294a-28: stong pa nyid kyi ye shes ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po yin la /
T02D2534:294a-29: de ston pa'i yi ge'i bye brag kyang snying po yin te /
T02D2534:294a-30: de gnyi ga'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2534:294a-31: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gsang bar gyur
T02D2534:294a-32: pa'o zhes bya ba ni skal pa dang mi ldan

T02D2534:294a-36: ba ni mchog tu yid rton pa'i gnas su gyur

T02D2534:294a-39: pa'i phyir ro // pa'i phyir ro // ba la / phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02D2534:294a-40: dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2534:294a-42: las kyi phyag rgyas kyang lha'i 'khor lo thams cad
T02D2534:294a-43: kyang 'debs pas na phyag rgya thams cad du gyur
T02D2534:294a-45: nye ba'i snying po dang rtsa ba'i gsang sngags dang /

T02D2534:294a-47: nyid can yin pas na gsang sngags thams cad du
T02D2534:294b-0: gyur pa'o // chos thams cad @294b brjod du med
T02D2534:294b-1: par smra ba rnams kyi dran pa dang shes bzhin
T02D2534:294b-2: yang dag par bskyed pa'o zhes bya ba la /
T02D2534:294b-3: dran pa ni chos la dmigs pa'i shes rab kyi cha dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2534:294b-4: shes bzhin ni dran pas 'jog pa'i dngos po rnams la brtan par bya ba'i phyir bsgom pa'o //
T02D2534:294b-5: bla na med pa'i shes rab bskyed pa dang /
T02D2534:294b-6: yid gzhungs par byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni gzhung
T02D2534:294b-7: dang don la dpyod cing rnam par 'jig pa'i bdag

T02D2534:294b-9: gzhung 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid can ni yid gzhungs pa ste /
T02D2534:294b-10: shes rab dang yid gzhungs pa de las lhan cig
T02D2534:294b-11: gong mar gyur pa med pas na bla na med
T02D2534:294b-12: pa'i shes rab dang yid gzhungs par byed pa'o //
T02D2534:294b-15: dbang phyug phun sum tshogs par byed pa'o zhes bya
T02D2534:294b-16: ba ni lus dang sems las gnod pa sel bar
T02D2534:294b-17: byed pa'i nus pa phul du byung ba bskyed pa'i
T02D2534:294b-18: ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir nad med pa'o //
T02D2534:294b-23: dbang phyug tu gyur pa dang /
T02D2534:294b-27: yon tan gyi dbang phyug brgyad phun sum tshogs par byed pa'am /
T02D2534:294b-28: yang na phyi dang nang gi bdag por gyur pa
T02D2534:294b-29: la phul du byung bar byed pas dbang phyug phun
T02D2534:294b-31: dpal dang dge ba dang zhi ba dang legs pa

T02D2534:294b-35: nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad ldog pa ni zhi ba'o //

T02D2534:295a-2: shin tu rnam par dag pa rnams kyi nang na shin tu rnam par dag pa yin te /

T02D2534:295a-6: sems can thams cad dag par byed pa yin pa'i
T02D2534:295a-7: phyir ro // shin tu 'byor ldan rnams kyi yang

T02D2534:295a-9: nams dang ye shes kyi skal ba phul du byung
T02D2534:295a-11: shin tu bkra shis pa rnams kyi yang shin tu
T02D2534:295a-12: bkra shis pa'o zhes bya ba ni dga' ston phul
T02D2534:295a-13: du byug ba'i khyad par skye ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2534:295a-14: skyabs 'dod pa rnams kyi skyabs so zhes bya ba
T02D2534:295a-15: ni 'jigs pa thams cad sel bas skyong ba'i phyir
T02D2534:295a-16: ro // gnas med pa rnams kyi gnas so zhes

T02D2534:295a-18: bral ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i gnas kyi ngo

T02D2534:295a-20: skyob pa 'dod pa rnams kyi skyob pa'o zhes bya
T02D2534:295a-21: ba ni 'jigs pa thams cad las skyob par byed
T02D2534:295a-23: dpung gnyen 'dod pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen no zhes
T02D2534:295a-24: bya ba ni ngan 'gro thams cad las bzlog nas
T02D2534:295a-25: bde 'gro'i gnas ster ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2534:295a-26: gling 'dod pa rnams kyi gling ngo zhes bya ba
T02D2534:295a-27: ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor lhung ba rnams kyi ngal
T02D2534:295a-28: bso ba'i gnas su gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2534:295a-29: 'khra sa med pa rnams kyi 'khra sa bla na
T02D2534:295a-30: med pa'o zhes bya ba ni lam dang lam ma
T02D2534:295a-31: yin pa shes pa la rmongs pa rnams ni yang

T02D2534:295a-33: // srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu 'gro ba
T02D2534:295a-34: rnams kyi gru'o zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen

T02D2534:295a-40: brag byed pa'i shes rab nyid ces bya ba ni

T02D2534:295b-19: de thob pas na thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes so //
T02D2534:295b-20: spyan lnga thob par bya ba'i phyir ye shes mthong
T02D2534:295b-21: ba yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni sha

T02D2534:295b-26: thob par byed cing shin tu yongs su dag pa'i

T02D2534:295b-28: zang zing dang mi 'jigs pa dang chos kyi sbyin
T02D2534:295b-29: pa gtong ba'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa drug

T02D2534:295b-41: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo

T02D2534:296a-0: // 'dzin dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs @296a * //

T02D2534:299a-21: bsod nams kyi tshogs nye bar bstan par bya ba'i
T02D2534:299a-26: gtam ngan gyi 'jigs pa yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur
T02D2534:299a-27: ro zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad sgyu ma
T02D2534:299a-28: dang 'dra bar khong du chud pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2534:299a-29: rgyud dang rus dang rigs bzang po dang yang ldan
T02D2534:299a-30: par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni nyes par spyod
T02D2534:299a-31: pa'i las thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i phyir
T02D2534:299a-32: ro // kun nas mdzes pa dang gzugs dang kha
T02D2534:299a-33: dog dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba
T02D2534:299a-34: ni bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir ro ;
T02D2534:299a-35: ;'jig rten pa rnams la sdug pa dang yid du
T02D2534:299a-36: 'ong ba dang 'grogs na bde ba dang mthong na
T02D2534:299a-37: dga' bar yang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni byams
T02D2534:299a-38: pa dang snying rje'i mig gnyis kyis sems can thams
T02D2534:299a-39: cad la lta ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2534:299a-40: 'jig rten rnams la mdzes pa dang skal pa dang
T02D2534:299a-41: ldan pa dang tshig btsan par yang 'gyur ro zhes
T02D2534:299a-42: bya ba ni bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la nges
T02D2534:299a-44: gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der yang
T02D2534:299a-45: tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba chos
T02D2534:299a-46: kyi sbyin pa la bslabs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2534:299a-47: longs spyod kyi gzhi che ba dang /
T02D2534:299b-0: longs spyod kyi gzhi mi zad pa dang @299b 'khor
T02D2534:299b-1: mi zad par yang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni
T02D2534:299b-2: bdag gis thams cad yongs su gtong ba la bslabs
T02D2534:299b-3: pa'i phyir ro // sems can thams cad kyi mchog
T02D2534:299b-4: dang yon tan mchog dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro
T02D2534:299b-5: zhes bya ba ni dri ma med pa'i shes rab
T02D2534:299b-6: la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i phyir ro
T02D2534:299b-7: pa'i phyir ro // // rang bzhin gyis kyang pha
T02D2534:299b-8: rol tu phyin pa drug gi yon tan dang ldan
T02D2534:299b-9: par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni pha rol tu
T02D2534:299b-10: phyin pa drug gi ngo bo nyid byang chub kyi
T02D2534:299b-11: sems mi brjed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2534:299b-12: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la yang gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni byams pa dang /
T02D2534:299b-15: btang snyoms la gus par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2534:299b-21: ye shes dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba
T02D2534:299b-22: ni lhun gyis grub par 'jug pa'i lam 'thob pa
T02D2534:299b-23: las so // bstan bcos thams cad la 'jigs pa med pa dang smra mkhas par yang 'gyur ro //
T02D2534:299b-24: mi blun pa dang tshig gsal ba dang sgrin por
T02D2534:299b-25: yang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni dri ma med
T02D2534:299b-26: pa'i shes rab 'thob pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2534:299b-31: sred pa med par yang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba
T02D2534:299b-32: ni chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur rtogs pas
T02D2534:299b-33: brtson 'grus rnam pa gsum 'thob pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2534:299b-34: sems can thams cad kyis mchog tu yid brten par bya ba dang /
T02D2534:299b-35: slob dpon dang bla mar bkur bar yang 'gyur ro
T02D2534:299b-36: zhes bya ba ni mchog tu yid brten pa'i gnas
T02D2534:299b-37: kyi don dang / las so sor rtog pa'i chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2534:299b-38: des sngon ma thos pa'i bzo dang /
T02D2534:299b-40: mngon par shes pa dang bstan bcos thams cad kyang
T02D2534:299b-41: don dang yi ge'i sgo nas shes par 'gyur ro
T02D2534:299b-42: zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid dang /
T02D2534:299b-45: mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'i sgo mngon sum du byas pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2534:299b-47: 'tsho ba dang kun du spyod pa shin tu yongs
T02D2534:299b-48: su dag par spyod pa dang legs par rab tu
T02D2534:299b-49: byung ba dang / legs par bsnyen par rdzogs par
T02D2534:299b-50: yang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni lus dang ngag
T02D2534:299b-51: dang yid kyi nyes par spyod pa las ldog pa'i
T02D2534:299b-52: ngo bo nyid kyis chos rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2534:300a-1: pa nyid kyi byang chub kyi sems kyang mi brjed
T02D2534:300a-2: par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi
T02D2534:300a-3: sems mi brjed pa'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs par byed
T02D2534:300a-4: pa'i phyir ro // nyan thos dang /
T02D2534:300a-6: rang sangs rgyas kyi nges pa la nams kyang 'jug
T02D2534:300a-7: par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni theg pa
T02D2534:300a-8: de la mngon par 'dod pa med pa nyid dang
T02D2534:300a-9: / theg pa gcig gi tshul la mkhas pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2534:300a-10: lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang de ltar na
T02D2534:300a-11: yon tan dpag tu med pa dag dang ldan par
T02D2534:300a-12: 'gyur te / rnam pa de lta bu'i yon tan
T02D2534:300a-13: gyi tshogs dpag tu med pa gzhan dag dang yang
T02D2534:300a-15: lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang don dam pa'i
T02D2534:300a-16: ming yang dag par brjod pa 'di yang dag par
T02D2534:300a-17: 'dzin pa'i skyes bu gang zag de ni bsod nams
T02D2534:300a-18: dang / ye shes kyi tshogs legs par bsags shing /
T02D2534:300a-19: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams shin tu myur du
T02D2534:300a-20: bsgrubs nas ring por mi thogs pa bla na med
T02D2534:300a-21: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
T02D2534:300a-23: bskal pa mang por yongs su myang ngan las 'das
T02D2534:300a-24: pa'i chos su mi 'gyur bar sems can thams cad
T02D2534:300a-25: la bla na med pa'i chos ston pa dang /
T02D2534:300a-26: phyogs bcur dam pa'i chos kyi rnga sgra chen po
T02D2534:300a-27: rgyun mi 'chad par sgrogs pa'i chos kyi rgyal po
T02D2534:300a-28: chen por 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2534:300a-29: myur du mngon par shes pas so zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
T02D2534:300a-30: aom sarba dharm'a bh'a ba sva bh'a ba bi shuddha
T02D2534:300a-31: badzra aa a'a aam aa:pra kri ti pa ri shuddha:sarba
T02D2534:300a-33: sarba ta th'a ga t'a dzny'a na k'a ya manydzu
T02D2534:300a-34: shr'i pa ri shuddhi t'a mu p'a d'a ye ta
T02D2534:300a-35: aa a'a aom sarba ta th'a ga t'a hri da
T02D2534:300a-36: ya ha ra ha ra aom h'um hr'i: bha ga
T02D2534:300a-37: b'an dzny'a na m'u rti b'a g'i shva ra ma
T02D2534:300a-38: h'a p'a tsa sarba dha rma ga ga n'a ma
T02D2534:300a-39: la su pa ri shuddha dha rma dh'a tu dzny'a
T02D2534:300a-40: na garbha a'a: // zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di thog
T02D2534:300a-41: ma dang tha ma dang bar du byin gyis brlab
T02D2534:300a-43: de yang yi ge aa ni /
T02D2534:300a-44: byang chub kyi bdag nyid can no //
T02D2534:300a-45: a'a ni sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i spyod pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02D2534:300a-46: aom ni sangs rgyas nyid ston pa'o //
T02D2534:300a-47: aam ni mya ngan las 'das pa chen po ston par byed pa'o //
T02D2534:300a-48: aa: ni ye shes kyi sku byin gyis rlob par byed pa'o //
T02D2534:300a-49: aom h'um hr'i: ni sku dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis rlob par byed pa'o //
T02D2534:300b-0: aa ni rgyu dang @300b mi rgyu ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi dngos po thams cad ni /
T02D2534:300b-1: chos kyi dbyings gsung gi dbang phyug gi bdag nyid
T02D2534:300b-2: can yin pas chos kyi skur rgyas btab pa'i don
T02D2534:300b-3: du 'dir gsungs pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T02D2534:300b-4: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag tu ste /
T02D2534:300b-5: gsang sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i rjes thogs nyid la /
T02D2534:300b-6: bdud la sogs pa rnams kyis mi tshugs par byin
T02D2534:300b-7: gyis brlabs shing rgyas btab shing rgyas btab pas bdag
T02D2534:300b-8: gi don yongs rdzogs pas na dga' ba'o //
T02D2534:300b-9: gzhan gyi don yongs su rdzogs pas na mgu ba'o //
T02D2534:300b-10: de ltar rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po gsang ba'i
T02D2534:300b-11: bdag po lag na rdo rje rnams dang bcas pas
T02D2534:300b-12: bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas tshig 'di skad
T02D2534:300b-14: mgon po bdag cag yi rang ngo //
T02D2534:300b-15: legs so legs so legs par gsungs //
T02D2534:300b-17: 'gro ba mgon med rnams dang ni //
T02D2534:300b-18: bdag dag yang dag rdzogs pa yi //
T02D2534:300b-19: byang chub thob pa'i don chen mdzad //
T02D2534:300b-21: bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par mdzad pa'o //
T02D2534:300b-23: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshul bstan pa //
T02D2534:300b-24: 'di ni rnam dag legs pa'i lam //
T02D2534:300b-25: zab cing yang sa la rgya che ste //
T02D2534:300b-26: don chen 'gro ba'i don byed pa //
T02D2534:300b-28: de bas na nges pa kho nar bla na med
T02D2534:300b-29: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par
T02D2534:300b-30: byed pa'o // don 'di la ni sangs rgyas nyid tshad mar gyur pa yin pa'i phyir /
T02D2534:300b-31: sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul 'di ni //
T02D2534:300b-32: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya rnams kyis bshad //
T02D2534:300b-34: mtshan mchog shin tu legs par brgyan pa'i skur ldan zhing //
T02D2534:300b-35: nam mkha'i ngos ltar yangs pa'i grags phreng kun du khyab //
T02D2534:300b-36: dge ba'i dri tshogs rgyas pas ma lus sad mdzad cing //
T02D2534:300b-37: ngan pa'i rab rib tshogs dang las kyi dra ba 'joms //
T02D2534:300b-38: bdag sogs rmongs pa'i sgrib pa'i rab rib spong byed pa'i //
T02D2534:300b-39: bdag med seng ge'i sgra sgrogs bdag bral de bzhin nyid //
T02D2534:300b-40: de nyid de las mi 'gyur ming las mtshan rnams su //
T02D2534:300b-41: yang dag brjod sgra mkhyen nas smra mchog rnams kyis gsungs //
T02D2534:300b-42: mtshan rnams yang dag brjod de yon tan tshogs kyis
T02D2534:300b-43: phyug / nyam nyid mtshan 'dir 'bad de tshul bzhin
T02D2534:300b-44: rnam bkrol nas // 'gro kun rjes su brtse phyir bdag gis byas pa yi //
T02D2534:301a-1: rmongs pa'i tshogs rnams ma lus 'joms byed yin //
T02D2534:301a-2: sngags don rig pas rab gsal dgrol bar bya min gyi //
T02D2534:301a-3: mkhas pas lung gi snying po skyon don brtags la yang //
T02D2534:301a-4: yang dag tshul sgo du mas mi 'gal rtogs byas na //
T02D2534:301a-5: ma lus don gyis brgyan zhing legs par rtogs pas dgrol //
T02D2534:301a-6: 'dis byas bdag gi bsod nams zla ba ltar dga' ba //
T02D2534:301a-7: mkha' ltar mtha' med mthar thug yang dag gang thob pa'i //
T02D2534:301a-8: bsod nams tshogs des 'jig rten 'di dag ma lus pa //
T02D2534:301a-9: thams cad mkhyen nyid thob pa'i bde la reg gyur
T02D2534:301a-10: cig / de bzhin 'jam dpal grags bcas 'jig rten
T02D2534:301a-11: 'di kun yon tan gyis brgyan zhing //
T02D2534:301a-12: mkhas pa rnams kyis mchog gyur shes rab ye shes mchog gi lus dang ldan //
T02D2534:301a-13: las kyi 'ching ba rnams las rab grol snying rje chen po rnams 'phro zhing //
T02D2534:301a-14: 'khor bar skyo med sems kyis gzhan don byed la
T02D2534:301a-15: rtag tu 'jug / bdud dang mu stegs las rgyal
T02D2534:301a-16: bde gshegs sras mchog 'jam dbyangs nyid gyur cig /'phags
T02D2534:301a-17: pa 'jam dpal gyis mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i
T02D2534:301a-18: rgya cher 'grel ba slob dpon chen po 'jam dpal
T02D2534:301a-19: grags pa'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so
T02D2534:301a-21: / // / rgyal sras dam pa mgon po 'jam dbyangs kyi //
T02D2534:301a-22: yon tan phul byung mtshan gyi khyad par 'di //
T02D2534:301a-23: kun la grags kyang ji bzhin don la khrel //
T02D2534:301a-24: yang dag don la nor pa'i dri mas bslad //
T02D2534:301a-25: don 'di gzigs pas rje rgyal bla ma yis //
T02D2534:301a-26: gzhan la phan bzhed bka' yis bskul bas na //
T02D2534:301a-27: rgya chen sgra don bdag blos ma rtogs kyang //
T02D2534:301a-28: bka' mnyan mos blo gtso bor byas pas bsgyur //
T02D2534:301a-29: legs bkrol rgya chen don la rmongs gyur bas //
T02D2534:301a-30: log par bsgyur sogs tshul min bgyis pa 'chags //
T02D2534:301a-31: sgra dang don mkhas nus ldan byung gyur na //
T02D2534:301a-32: tshig don brtags la nor pa bcos par gsol //
T02D2534:301a-33: chos don gnyer zhing mtshan mchog rgyas byas pas //
T02D2534:301a-34: dam pa'i zhing 'dir dge ba gang bskrun des //
T02D2534:301a-35: 'gro kun mtshan rtogs blo yi skyon bral zhing //
T02D2534:301a-36: bdag kyang blo mchog 'jam dbyangs mtshungs par shog /
T02D2534:301a-37: rgya gar gyi mkhan po a'a tsa rya shraddha ka
T02D2534:301a-38: ra barma dang / ka ma la gupta dang /
T02D2534:301a-39: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong rin chen
